You groaned and spoke up to her. Smelling more of her farts, especially when closer to the source, was not something you wanted to experience.

Twilight finished writing and turned back to you. "Of course I'm sure! Peppermint, don't worry. This won't be dangerous, we'll just run a few tests then I'll have you back to normal before long! Now, let's try out your sense of taste. I'm quite interested in this one."

You gulped loudly as her gas seemed to finally clear, only to find it replaced with the rancid smell of her hoof you were standing on. "Taste?!"

She giggled and nodded as she levitated you with her magic. "Yes taste! It will be simple, just keep your mouth open!" Before you could protest she brought your face right to her sweaty hoof, which seemed like it hadn't been cleaned all day. You opened your mouth to yell but this proved to be a very bad idea as you were rubbed all along her hoof. The taste was absolutely vile and only got worse as sweat pooled into your mouth. Twilight did this for about a minute until she seemed pleased with herself and finally pulled you off. "So?"

You gag and cough up some of her hoof sweat, though not all of considering you had been forced to swallow some of it. "That was the worst thing I've ever tasted! It was like making out with a fat stinking ass! When was the last time you washed your hooves?!" You yelled and groaned as all you could taste was her dirty hoof, it was like it seared itself onto your tongue. You wanted to curse Twilight out for doing such a repulsive thing, especially when there was absolutely no reason for it when she could have just made you taste something actually pleasant like food. It seemed Twilight had been so eager to test out this spell she hadn't thought ahead.

Twilight blushed a bit. "Um, sorry it was yesterday morning. I missed my bath today, I was just sooo busy... Anyway. It definitely seems like your sense of taste is stronger! Let's try out another test just to be sure though. And since you gave me the idea..." Again before you could speak up she brought you towards her plot, your eyes going wide upon seeing your destination. Kissing her unwashed ass was about the very last thing in the world you wanted to do. Unfortunately before you could close your mouth she slammed your face against her fat cheek, your lips pressing against it. The taste was indescribable and made you cringe. In fact it was so bad you could feel yourself passing out as your senses were overwhelmed, your vision going blurry as all you could see was her ass.
111111112.title: Test out your senses, this is going to stink...

11111112.content:
"Uh... transformation?" You ask, scared to even hear the answer.

Twilight nods enthusiastically. "They're a little tricky, but essentially they allow you to transform something, or somepony, into an object of your choice."

You gulped, sensing you were once again going to be Twilight's guinea pig. At least it seemed like she knew what she was doing, but there was always the chance of things going disastrously wrong and ending up as a chair or a lamp permanently.

Twilight raised the spellbook up towards her and began turning pages until she reached the one about transformation spells, her brow furrowing slightly as she studied it closely.

"Hm," She started, "It seems simple enough. The book suggests a couple of things I could try on you."

"Will it... hurt?"

She shook her head. "It shouldn't. It might feel a little strange, but you'll be fine. The reversal spell is very easy to perform."

With this, she offered the book to you, opened on the page, and pointed to the small list of objects it seemed to recommend transforming a pony into. You'd heard of troublesome wizards using a similar spell on ponies they didn't like to permanently leave them stuck as an item of furniture. The idea seemed horrifying, but you had confidence in Twilight's ability to reverse the spell if you needed.

The items the book seemed to suggest were... unusual, to say the least, but thinking about it for a second, you decided on...
11111112.title: "A Transformation spell!"

111111121.content:
"Hm. Okay! That should be easy." Twilight stepped back, checking over the page of the spellbook again and then beginning to focus, her horn illuminating with a purple aura and pointed towards you.

At first, it didn't seem like anything was happening, but suddenly a strange tingling sensation ran through your entire body. It wasn't painful, but certainly wasn't pleasant, either. You felt your blood quake through your veins and your skin crawl over every inch of your frame. Extending a hoof, you remarked, with surprise, that it seemed to be shrinking down, eventually disappearing up into your shoulder.

You tried to remain calm, closing your eyes and trying to ignore the change that was taking place across your body; you felt yourself collapse onto the floor as your legs, too, seemed to gradually shrivel up into nothingness. You could feel every bone and muscle realigning, your skin growing tighter, then looser, then tighter again as it readjusted to your shifting structure.

The unfamiliar sensation heightened, feeling like the rushing, unstoppable feeling of g force you would get on a rollercoaster hurtling down a great height. Suddenly, the sensations just stopped. You opened your eyes, staring up at the ceiling. No matter what you did, you couldn't move. You couldn't even speak. All you could do was look around you, and take in silent breaths of air, as if you were breathing through your nose.

"Oh, wow!" Twilight exclaimed, trotting over to you hastily and staring down into your eyes.

"Uh... are you okay there, Peppermint?"

Of course you couldn't reply, so you just blinked.

"Well, I'll take that as a yes. It worked!" She reached down and picked you up. Though you couldn't sense too much, you could feel that you were loose and draping over Twilight's hoof. It was a very strange, very scary sensation, but you felt surprisingly calm.

"Hold on. Let me show you." She turned to look for a mirror, and finding one, held it up to you.

Looking back at you was a small, purple pair of panties, laying helplessly in Twilight's hoof. If you had a heart, it would probably start beating a lot faster.

Twilight continued to gaze down at you, studying you like a specimen in a jar.

"I think we should test your resistance." She commented, and then, without a word of warning, grabbed you by both sides and began to stretch you. The sensation was very unusual, but not painful.

"Hm. Not bad." She said to herself, staring down at you again. You could tell an idea was starting to develop.

"We're going to need to see if you can withstand your intended purpose, though. If so, maybe I'll be able to try some more advanced transformations."

You weren't sure what she meant by 'intended purpose', but you couldn't exactly ask.

Your answer came soon after, though, as Twilight once again stretched you out, and put both her hind hooves through your leg holes, pulling you up until you were tightly in place over her rump.

"There! It's... a little bit of a tight fit, but you certainly seem to be maintaining your elasticity." The mare blushed, shaking her hips slightly and stretching her legs to get comfortable. You realised that you could sense everything; the clean, but still musky scent of her nethers consumed you entirely, and you became infused with her body heat.

"Now, let's try..." She said to herself quietly, heading across the room. You felt yourself rub over her thighs and cheeks with smooth, soft friction.

She paused, turned, and you only had a few seconds to see the empty chair beneath you before Twilight sat down on it with a soft thud, sending a shockwave through your entire "body". Now, all you could see was darkness, her ass pressed against the hard wooden surface.

You felt yourself rub against the chair mercilessly as Twilight tested your limits.

"Doing okay down there?" She asked, her voice muffled, "Oh, sorry. I forgot you can't exactly... talk."

She chuckled nervously, clearly a little too caught up in the outcomes of this particular experiment to have thought about your wellbeing.

"There's one more thing I need to test out..." She began apprehensively, clearly having left this until last for a reason. "You're not going to like it, but it won't last long. I promise."

You had no idea what it was she could possibly mean, but when the sound of a soft grunt came from Twilight, it all clicked instantly. Oh, dear Celestia...

Phrrmmmmmmmppp

The fart came out low and rumbling into the seat below her.

Your entire self was overcome by a thick, relentless smog-like cloud. It was entirely different to the experience of just smelling a fart, or even having a fart in the face, as Twilight's penetrating gas had literally passed through you; forcing you to take the brunt - soaking you in the dense, rancid stench of flatus.

If you could cough, you would, but you couldn't. You couldn't do anything besides breathe it in and remain in place hugging the princess' rear. Every thought was overcome; tainted by the pure, concentrated essence of her gas.

She lifted up from the chair, giving you another burst of flatulence - this time unintentionally - and attempted to peer round and get a look at you.

There was nothing you could do about your situation, as much as you wanted to get as far away from Twilight's ass in case something else slipped out. The smell was still all you could breathe in, and you sensed it wouldn't just disappear any time soon. The fact was, the particles of her gas had literally infused themselves into you. You were marked by this smell until she decided to wash you. In a way, you had become Twilight's farts.

She pulled you off of her again, holding you up in front of her and seemingly hit by a pang of the smell you were now permeated with.

"Ack! Sorry, Peppermint. At least we know you can withstand that... kinda." She grinned sheepishly. You were hoping she'd change you back soon, but she didn't seem to want to return you to your original form so soon. Maybe she was worried that once you were back, you would demand to leave immediately.

Instead, she left you down on a table and told you she had a few letters to send.

You had no sense of hunger or thirst. All you could do was think and smell, and considering you still were holding on to the remnants of Twilight's expulsions, you wished you couldn't even do the latter.

It was hard to tell how much time passed. There was so much to think about that it went quickly, and before you knew it Twilight had returned.

"Hey, Peppermint. How are you holding up?"

You just looked round at her, mute.

"Listen, Peppermint, I have been communicating with some friends, and I mentioned our experiment. It was impossible not to! It's not every day you pull off something so ambitious!"
You wondered where this was headed.

"The thing is... somepony has shown quite a lot of interest in... borrowing you. Just for a day or two."

Oh, dear...

"Obviously the limits of your new form are still to be seen, and, I felt that by lending you to somepony else, maybe it would be a good way of examining some of those limits, so I said yes."

Great. Twilight was at least vaguely considerate, but you couldn't be sure another pony would show you the same remorse. After all, you were nothing more than an article of clothing now; an object that could be thrown around, used, or abused in any way the wearer intended. You couldn't fight back. You couldn't protest. You couldn't even voice discomfort. Until Twilight turned you back, this was your life.

"I promise that once they return you, I'll perform the reversal spell. It will just be for a day or two, like I say."

She came over to you, picking you up, and then folding you a few times.

"I'm sorry to spring this on you so suddenly, but they asked that I send you to them by mail this evening. When you get back, I'll make it up to you, I promise." You could tell she meant this genuinely, but you couldn't guarantee whomever it was that received you would have such good intentions.

With one last look you saw a grey, blonde-haired mail pony at the door, smiling and ready to deliver you to your new temporary residence.

"Oh, Hey Derpy. This is the package I mentioned. If you could just deliver this to..."
111111121.title: A pair of panties

choices: The mail pony takes you for herself!
11111112133.title: Somepony else

choices: You pass the time by going for a wander
111112.content:
"I'm sure we can come back to that. Would you like to see where you'll be staying?"

You nod quickly. maintaining a grin as Twilight leads you out from this study area and back into the corridor.

"As the nature of your position is going to be, well, very personal, I decided to renovate the room next to mine for you to sleep in, so you're on call whenever I might need you!"
She seemed genuinely very excited to have you here; you weren't surprised that it was hard to find a pony who was willing to put up with her problems, but it wasn't really something that bothered you too much. You'd never particularly been turned away from anypony having less-than-perfect manners, and truthfully you really did want to get closer to Twilight. The idea of being so intimate with such an important pony - one you admittedly looked up to - was worth a little flatulence.

After ascending a couple of staircases, Twilight stopped you outside a large doorway.

"So, here's your room! There's a bed, a desk, some reading material, an en suite bathroom, and a view that I'm sure you'll like!" She outstretches a hoof proudly, and you step inside, almost taken aback by how ornate the room is. You've barely even seen somewhere this fancy before, let alone stay in it.

"I'm just in the next room, so if I need any assistance I'll just call. I have a little research later, and, well, I was wondering if you might help me with it."

"Of course. How can I help?"

Her face flushes red once more, and she looks away from you. "Well, as dumb as it seems, sometimes the smell of my, y'know, can distract me from my studying. Really pull me out of it, so I need somepony to..."

"Take the hit for you?"

"Right. It can get pretty stinky in the evenings, juuust a word of warning." She smiles.

"It's fine. I'm happy to help."

You're starting to think that all of your duties are going to be related in some way to Twilight's rump and whatever comes from it.

"See you later!"
111112.title: “Let’s move onto something else.”

1111121.content:
By the time you’ve unpacked and settled in to your room, the sun is already setting and the evening has already come.

You exit out into the corridor and wonder if Twilight is already in her room, but before you can knock, a guard rounds the corner and comes up the corridor towards you.

“Would you like dinner? There’s some prepared in the main dining hall.”

“Oh... yes, thank you.” He nods and departs.

You’d been so busy you’d almost forgotten about eating - it was probably best to do so before you went to help Twilight. You had a feeling the experience would quickly ruin your appetite.

You wander along the corridors and head downstairs, taking the time to admire the murals, paintings, and lavish design that every part of this castle seems to have been decorated with. There’s a nice, cool atmosphere inside with the crystal and stone walls and floors, making you feel very comfortable, and really very at home despite not even being here a day. Though your work is... less than desirable, the deal you have here is not bad at all. Not only are you working personally with a Princess, you’re able to live in luxury. It’s definitely worth having to smell a few smelly farts and help out with some slightly weird and unusual experiments.

After a few wrong turns and a lot of walking, you find the dining hall, and more than that... it’s empty.

A large table stretches across the length of the great space, looking as if it were fit to hold at least fifty ponies, but right now there are none.

The only ponies in the room are a couple of guards who greet you as you enter.

“Where’s Twilight?” You ask.

“The Princess has been invited to a special dinner outside of Ponyville tonight, as she is meeting with some delegates from Cheneigh in the far south.”

“Oh.”

You decide to just sit wherever you want. It’s not surprising that Twilight is a busy pony with a lot of appointments, and you’ll have more than enough time to spend with her later on, you’re sure.

A waiter comes by to give you your meal; a nicely-prepared soufflé with a small bundle of roasted vegetables alongside it.

You almost get the impression they just threw together something simple as the Princess was out of the castle, but you didn’t mind, and sated your hunger by digging in.

Halfway through eating, you looked up to notice to more creatures had entered the dining hall; a light purple unicorn with small highlights in her mane, and a short purple dragon. They choose seats and the waiters float across with their meals straight away.

“Oh, hey!” The unicorn greets you. “You must be Twilight’s new assistant!”

“Yeah, I just got here today.”

“Let’s hope Spike doesn’t get jealous!” She looks down to the dragon, who is about to put a forkful of food into his mouth, but stops to talk.

“Don’t worry. Me and Twilight agreed for me to take a break for a while. I love being her assistant, but it’s exhausting! Besides, I’m trying to get into the body guard business!”

“Uh... bodyguard?”

“Yeah! I figure a lot of creatures, especially rich ones, need someone as their right hand man, so why not me?”

“You don’t think they’d want someone a little more, uh, brawny?”

“Hey! I’m brawny!” The dragon levered his arm to try and flex, but didn’t seem to produce so much as a lump.

The unicorn laughed as he rolled his eyes and started eating.

“Oh! I’m so rude! I’m Starlight Glimmer! This is Spike!” She waved, and Spike did the same, more preoccupied with his food than your presence.

“I’m Peppermint Swirl.” You introduce.

“So, has Twilight had you do anything yet? Order her books? File her socks in chronological order?” The unicorn giggled to herself.

You weren’t sure whether or not you should tell them the truth - if Spike had been her assistant for so long, surely he would have had to do similar things, but maybe not? Maybe Twilight had been taking care of her flatulence issues in private and only just brought an assistant in to help with them to take the load off.

“Oh, not much. I just helped with an experiment.”

“Helped with an experiment? Wow, she must really trust you!” Spike spoke up with a mouth full of soufflé.

“Oh, I just held a beaker.”

Of course, you didn’t specify that you were holding the beaker up against her asshole, or any other specifics of the task, but it was best to keep that information to yourself, in case the princess wanted to keep it private.

The evening pressed on, you made friendly small talk with Starlight and Spike, and after not too long, you could hear the main door to the castle open and brisk hoofsteps coming down the hallway towards the dining room.

Twilight appeared in the doorway, but she looked... almost panicked; her teeth were fixed into a grimace, her legs restless and her breathing seemed intense.

“Um... Peppermint... could I... ugh I need your assistance. It’s... time for... studying.” Between every other word she grunted and pulled a face, one eye half-closed - that almost looked like she was trying to hold down vomit... or hold something else in.

She seemed like she was really struggling to keep her composure, so it was probably a good idea to not keep her waiting.

“You better go, Peppermint. Twilight really does get excited about studying.” Starlight chuckled, but you knew already it wasn’t studying that had her so worked up.

Deciding it was best to not keep her waiting, you quickly got up and followed after her, sprinting up stairs and through corridors until the two of you reached her room.

You followed Twilight inside seconds before she used her magic to slam the door, and stood shaking in the center of the room, legs slightly apart and brow furrowed, she let loose.

The fart that came ripping from Twilight like a faulty lawnmower was so loud you wondered if her shutting the door would even do anything.

She gasped, exasperated, and seemed to raise her rump up slightly - this was one long fart, and you could almost feel the second hand relief from her as it ripped and roared from the princess, seeming to get a little more wet until it dribbled into nothing.

It didn’t exactly end there, though, as with an extra push another fart ached and eeked from her for what had to be a further five or six seconds.

She let out a sigh almost as loud and audacious as her gas, and collapsed forward onto her bed, breathing heavily.

“Sorry. I was holding that in the entire journey back. I was about to explode!” She gasped.

In a way, she still did explode, but it was probably better to do it here than on a cramped carriage ride.

“I’m sorry - I’ll open the window.” She was sill out of breath, using her purple magic to push the window open a crack and then levitate a small air freshener from her bedside table and spray the room a few times. You got the impression she probably relied on this a lot, seeing as two empty bottles sat in the small waste paper basket by her work desk.

“I had dinner with some delegates from Cheneigh and we had some of their national curries and bhajis. They were delicious, but I do not think they agreed with me.”
If the previous display wasn’t enough to prove she was right, a quick, damp-sounding fart slipped out from under her tail.

“Sorry. Ugh. That does not smell good.”

Somehow the smell from the particularly long fart she had just let out hadn’t reached you yet - probably because she was closer the window than she was to you - but still she sprayed some of the air freshener again.

“Sorry. I didn’t need to call you up in such a panic, I just wasn’t sure what to do! That was pretty... embarrassing.” She peered back at you over her shoulder and smiled, though the sides of her mouth were deep red with a blush.

“It’s fine. All part of the job, right?” You could already tell you were in for a smelly night - you hadn’t had a chance to actually get a sample of her curry gas yet, but based on the copious amounts of air freshener she was still spritzing liberally from the can, you could tell it wasn’t at all pleasant.

“Oh, man, that korma must have had milk in it.” She turned over, her hoof rubbing her pained stomach as she laid another wet-sounding fart into the bed sheets.

Her breathing slowed and she seemed to regain her composure, standing back up and breathing a heavy sigh.

“I’m sorry! This isn’t a great night to start. I’m not usually this bad!” She played it off with an awkward laugh, still blushing just as much.

“I do have some important letters to write, though. I’m sorry to have to do this to you, but, as you can tell... I kinda need your assistance.”
She seemed embarrassed even to ask.

It was the job you’d agreed to, after all. You just hoped you had enough stamina to keep up with her on a particularly... farty night.
1111121.title: The evening comes around fast

choices: Take a shower then get some sleep
11111211.content:
“I’m ready.” You tell her, and she nods, gesturing over to her writing desk.

“Get into position. I’ll - ugh get myself over there when I can.”

You head towards the desk, and as you do quickly realize the chair Twilight has against her desk isn’t ordinary at all; a large oval shape is cut into the seat of the chair and below it sits a large box. You can only assume this is where your head goes.

It’s a slightly awkward angle to get yourself into; you need to lie back so that your legs and arms are coming away from the desk and your head sits just under, pointing towards the wall.

Taking one final breath of fresh air and savoring it, you get down and shove your head into the box. It’s padded and actually quite comfortable inside.

There are also slits in the side of the box to let in the light, but seem to have been fitted with glass to keep in the smell.

After a few moments of getting used to this compartment and what you’re about to endure, Twilight manages to get herself over to her desk and takes a seat, immediately blocking out some of the light, but you’re able to make out the sight of her spread cheeks less than two inches away from your face; her tailhole sits, pursing slightly about level with your muzzle, and her marehood is directly above your forehead, half visible through the oval gap and half not.

The smell of her bare nethers isn’t bad at all; slightly sweaty but you can tell she cleans well and often.

It seems like you can hear her fairly well from down here, too as she sighs, despite the box feeling quite sealed.

It wasn’t long before she let out her first fart, windy and gushing from her puckered anus.

brrooooooo

You could feel the hot wind fill up the box, and the smell soon followed.

holy Celestia, it was not good. Your first instinct was to try and reach your hoof up to your nostrils, but realized quickly that this wasn’t possible.

You had to just lie, face scrunched and contorted as the impossibly sharp and foul smell found its way into your nostrils.

You could smell the damage the exotic, aromatic spices had done to Twilight’s poor stomach; the resulting smell of her fart was like a cloyingly bitter mix of curry and mustard - sweet yet unmistakably the smell of flatulence.

“Sorry. I hope it’s not too bad down there.” She shuffled to get comfortable and you could hear her start to write.

To be honest, it was too bad, but what could you do? You’d already agreed to help Twilight with this most intimidate and disgusting deed, and it was definitely on the edge of bearable, even if it made your stomach turn and your nose burn and ache. You certainly never imagined that the princess of friendship could be so incredibly stinky.

“It’s really an amazing place, though.” She started, making casual conversation as if she hadn’t just ripped a fart right into your face, “there are so many old ruins and pieces of history! I’d love to take another visit there someday - only I think next time I’ll bring a packed lunch.”

The last word or two are drowned out by another blast of gas, this time slightly spluttery and inconsistent. The box seems to somewhat muffle the sound too.

That same strong smell washes over you about a second later. You expect to be somehow used to it, but it hits just as hard as before. Another fart, this one moist-sounding, dribbles out and you hear her sigh in relief.

“Sorry.” She apologises again, though you’re not sure why. You can tell this is something she’s fairly embarrassed about, especially in front of you.

“I have to say, though, you’re doing a very good job! I can’t smell anything.”

You’re not surprised with how intense the smell has been for you and how airtight this chamber seems to be.

You can hear her quill scribbling on paper above you, still swimming in the vestigial smell of her emissions.

You can also occasionally hear her stomach working away and digesting; ominously low growling sounds that end in little internal squirts and whines. Her stomach is clearly doing its best to evacuate the foreign spices and the hefty dairy with equally hefty farts.

She winced in pain as you simultaneously heard a rupturing rolling thunderous growl come from somewhere up above you in the princess’ inner workings, and less than five seconds later were blitzed with a hot steamy hiss and an immediately repugnant curry smell, exactly like baked onions and rancid tomatoes thrown together with that same lingering mustardy undertone.

She gasped loudly after this airy, sultry stream of fetid gas had left her bowels; with every fart she was probably feeling gradually better, so at least you didn’t have to endure this forever.

Your eyes teared up at the sides and you felt your nose was scrunched up, cringing as you took deep sniffs that seemed to cleanse the back of your nose and mouth like menthol.

There was no getting used to the smell, but you wanted to help Twilight however you could. That was why you were here, after all. This probably wasn’t a job that many ponies were willing to do, and in that way you felt quite fortunate.

The rump above you raised up as Twilight leaned forwards and lifted herself up and away from the seat.

“Let me just give you a little air. We wouldn’t want you, y’know, passing out or anything.” She giggled bashfully. What an adorable dork.

You could see her looking down at you in the box. “Comfortable?” She grinned, but before you had the chance to answer the residual smell had clearly wafted up to her and she recoiled, eyes shut tightly and tongue distended.

“Ack! Wow! That is...” she blushed, holding her hoof over her muzzle and opening the window a little more, then spraying some more air freshener around her.

“Sorry. I don’t think there’s... much more.”

She gives you a few more moments to savor the relatively fresh air and give your lungs a rest before unexpectedly letting a loud fart out into the room above you. You can tell by the look on her face this was accidentally and she quickly sits back down again.

Your eyes readjust to the reduced light and the same view as before; her winking anus that sticks out, puffy, and like a bomb could go off unexpectedly at any time.

The remainder of your session together goes past surprisingly quickly. Every couple of minutes she tenses up and blasts another airy fart into your little box, which you promptly inhale. It still burns, but you manage to breathe most of it in.

They all have the same stench, too, but the last two or three farts seem slightly more potent. So much so that the final whispery one she dispels into the box actually makes you cough.

“Oh, are you okay!?” She gets up and peers down into your headrest, but you assure her you’re fine.

“I think that’s all of it. Well... to be perfectly honest, I think I need to use the little fillies’ room, and... yeah...” she starts blushing again and trails off, clearly too embarrassed to tell you she’d rather not risk letting out more than just gas onto your face.

As bad as her farts are to sniff point blank, at least you’re spared the ablutions. You don’t even want to imagine the sorry state she’ll leave the toilet in; you got the impression whatever she ate in Cheneigh didn’t agree with her at all. Hopefully the next time you had to assist her in this way her stomach wouldn’t be quite so upset and as a result her farts wouldn’t be quite so strong.

Using her magic, Twilight opens up the box again and you pull yourself out, glad to feel clean air on your now sweaty face.

“anyway if you’ll excuse me..” the princess bids you goodbye and leaves fairly hastily to visit the bathroom.

“Will you need my services again this evening?” You ask her just before she leaves.

“Oh, no. You did a great job. Thanks.” With that, she doesn’t stay around any longer and the short, wet fart that accidentally slips out from her cheeks tells you it’s best she doesn’t.

It’s nice to take a moment to relax. You sit on Twilight’s bed for a moment, looking around at how neat and nicely-decorated her room is. You’d expect nothing less from a princess.

It’s starting to get a little late, and it seems like a good time to get back to your room next door and sleep after such a busy day. However, you decide a quick shower first wouldn’t go amiss.
11111211.title: Time to get to work

choices: Shrug it off and get to bed
111112111.content:
It probably would’ve been wise to ask Twilight which bathroom you’d be using; you assume a castle as big as this one must have multiple places to shower or bathe.

You head down the corridor for a while until passing a door slightly ajar; peering inside you see a little shower room covered in pristine white tiles and fitted with both a bath and a shower. Perfect.

There’s another room next to this one, though the door appears to be locked. You can assume this is probably the toilet Twilight is using.

You start the shower and climb in, letting the lukewarm water wash over you as you begin to scrub with a bar of soap. There are clean, neatly-prepared towels for you, too. This job already has its benefits.

Just as you’re about to finish up washing and head to bed, your eye is drawn suddenly to a small crack in the wall. You’re surprised you didn’t notice it before, as it’s fairly big, and the rest of the room is so well-maintained and spotless, but evidently whoever last cleaned this room missed the gap in the wall.

It suddenly occurs to you that the room on the other side is the bathroom Twilight is likely using. It would probably be a good idea to let her know about it tomorrow.

However... for just a second as you’re toweling yourself off, you get a weird curiosity to look through.
111112111.title: Take a shower then get some sleep

1111121111.content:
You pushed the curiosity down, realizing you were far too tired to even look. It was best to give Twilight her privacy, too.

Your room already felt homely, and as you sunk into the fresh, cool linen and silky sheets suddenly the deed of inhaling pony farts didn’t seem all too bad.


You fell asleep almost instantly, giving your body the rest it desperately yearned for.





The morning came suddenly and pleasantly, with the soft song of birds and the gentle touch of sunlight over your face.

Before too long, though, you realize the reason you were even awake in the first place was knocking on the door.

You sit up and stretch. “I’m awake.”


“The princess wishes to see you next door.” The voice of a guard comes through, and shortly after you hear his hoofsteps as he departs.


Well, you certainly didn’t have to wait around to get to work, but you felt well-rested.

Heading along the corridor and pausing outside Twilight’s door, you knock.



“Come in.”


You enter just as the Princess is lying sleepily under her bed sheets and spraying another can of air fresher around her, but it’s not enough to mask the muggy odor already filling the room.


“Ah. Peppermint. Good morning. I woke up with the worst bellyache, and...”


But she doesn’t need to say another word.

“You need assistance?”

She nods, bashfully aware of how inconvenient it must be to you.

“I thought maybe you could... come into bed with me to do it. These sheets seem to keep the, uh, smell in fairly well.”

You would probably disagree with that given the fact you’re already smelling her rank byproduct, but did as she said and crawled under the covers.


The bed was spacious, even with her in it, and though your legs and tail poked out the rest of your body was covered completely by the duvet.


“Sorry to ask for you so early, but I get the worst morning gas. Especially after I’ve had something a little... objectionable.”


It’s clear she’s become more comfortable with the whole situation, and truthfully you have too. It didn’t exactly make the experience any less nauseating, but it wasn’t quite as bad as you had first expected, and if you’d already survived her on one of her worst nights, it seemed like you could handle mostly anything this job would throw at you.

Speaking of, Twilight’s rump wasted no time and a thick, noisy fart blasted into the darkened space that your upper body and her lower body now occupied.

You could see her back legs sprawled out and her tail laid out across the sheet, and, perhaps a little too cocksure, you pull her tail out of the way, lowering your head down to where her tailhole sits and inhaling.


You quickly realize how bad an idea that is. The smell hits you like boiling vinegar and you retch immediately. It’s practically the same as last night, only it’s been brewing away in her belly as she's slept. Clearly it takes a little longer for food to go through her entirely; vestiges of last night’s exotic curries still clinging to her lower intestine.

“Oh, dear. Are you okay?” She asks with genuine concern.

“I’m fine.” You respond, wiping a tear from your eye.

It's best to take it one step at a time if you don't want to permanently damage your lungs.

She lets another fart leak out under the covers, this one much quieter and seeping out in a hot, fetid efflux.

You keep your head at a safer distance and inhale slowly and carefully. The hot curry stench burns the back of your throat, but is becoming slightly more manageable.

At the very least you can say it's sobering. If you were still a little sleepy before you're wide awake now.

"You're taking this pretty well." Twilight said languidly, resting her head into her pillow as she gradually relieved herself of her pent-up morning farts.

"Well, it's my job." You say back, muffled by the duvet.

"Still, it must be pretty stinky."

"It's not too bad." You lie, though to be honest it really isn't that unbearable.

She steams your face with another warm, intoxicating voidance that you almost instinctively sniff. It's less concentrated than the last one, so you decide that with the next fart she passes, you're actually going to try and inhale it straight from the source. You're not sure why. Maybe just to prove that you can.

"I think it's almost all gone, now, Just one last one." She yawns, rolling over onto her front and offering you the perfect opportunity to try and take one of these at point blank.

You lean in close, feeling the radiation of her body heat on your muzzle.

After a few more moments of silence, you hear the rasp of another fart and soon after feel its airstream against your nostrils.

As soon as you sniff it burns somewhere deep in your nose, but you keep in position. You sniff again, and again. It's starting to become a lot easier to hold in.

"Well. I think that's it. Thanks, Peppermint. You did a really good job."

It's true; you hadn't heard the familiar spray of her aerosol this entire time.

She pulls herself out of bed and then you do the same. She's still sleepy, her shoulders softly rising and falling as she sucks in another yawn.

"Ooh. I need a shower, and probably the bathroom again."

That's your cue to leave, but before you're out the door she stops you.

"Peppermint - I actually have a lighter schedule today, so I was going to ask.."

You look back at her as if she needed confirmation to continue.

"How would you like to grab some lunch in town? You came straight here, so, I'm assuming you haven't had a chance to see Ponyville properly yet."

"Of course. I'd love to!"

She smiles. "Great! I'll come by your room around 11:30, okay?" and with that, you head back to your room.

Wow. You already have a lunch date with princess Twilight herself! Well - not necessarily a date date, but it will be nice to spend some more time with Twilight that doesn't involve sucking in her farts.
1111121111.title: Shrug it off and get to bed

11111211111.content:
The heat subsided slightly as you and Twilight made your way down through the center of Ponyville. Naturally, you garnered a few looks. It was clear Twilight was respected a lot round here, unsurprisingly.

You stopped in what seemed to be the center of a restaurant district; a bunch of tables set out under colorful parasols.

“Is this your favorite place to eat here?” You asked Twilight, who turned round to face you.

“Well, not exactly. My favorite place is hayburger, but I figure it’s best I don’t eat anything too disruptive for your sake and for mine.” She blushed.

Even though she hadn’t told you, you assumed talking about her condition in public was a bad idea. It was clearly something she was a little self-conscious about sharing, even if she was becoming more and more comfortable with sharing it with you.

The two of you took a seat outside a cafe which wasn’t busy at all, but which Twilight insisted was the best. It also meant you had a little more privacy to talk away from the prying ears of the public.

“I recommend the feta and walnut salad - it’s delicious!” She licked her lips voraciously as she hailed over a waiter.

You peered down at the menu. It wasn’t cheap, but you sort of expected Twilight was covering the cost.

“I’ll have the feta and walnut salad with an orange juice, and...?” She looked to you, urging you to order.

Taking another quick glance at the menu you went with what looked good: a cress and cheese tart served with gourmet hay bites and an apple juice.

The waiter made a note and hurried off to get your food.

“Isn’t the weather wonderful today?” Twilight gazed out at the lively town square.

It was still warm, but not as blisteringly so as it had been the day before. You took a moment to just sit and enjoy the view with Twilight, before she started up a quiet conversation.

“I’m sure you noticed earlier that my, ehm, emissions had a similar odor to the ones last night.”

You had, but it seemed like a weird conversation starter.

“Yeah. Guess it was still going through your system.” Even you felt a little embarrassed discussing the subject in public.

“That’s just it. I was thinking, and it seems as though there are certain times of the day where certain meals are at different digestive stages.”

Of course she’d found a way to geek out about even this.

“For example... what I’m about to eat now will probably start to show itself this evening - around the time I’ll be studying, and what I eat this evening for dinner will likely be detectable tomorrow morning.”

You followed along, checking over your shoulder every few seconds to check there wasn’t anypony in ear shot.

“Although of course last night was an exception; as I had some food that didn’t agree with me, my body must have just tried to get it out of me as quickly as possible.”

She blushed, realizing what it was she was rambling on about.

“Sorry. It’s a little gross, but I find digestion fascinating! How certain especially potent base ingredients can find themselves coming through in the smell of the... flatulence.” She whispered that last word especially quietly.

She was right though. You had noticed the strong presence of onions and mustard in the smell of her gas, which you assumed were probably used a lot to cook the curries she had eaten.

You stopped yourself. Celestia, you were really analyzing the smell of a pony’s fart. You really had gone crazy.

The waiter appeared with your food, laying it down on the table and thanking Twilight as if her just being there was a blessing. You couldn’t deny that it was.

She dug into her salad like a ravished dog, quickly realizing she was in public and then eating a little slower.

“This is great!” She tells you enthusiastically with her mouth full.

Your lunch tastes great, too.

You think forward to the upcoming evening, realizing that in some way the salad Twilight is currently chowing down on will be filling your nostrils. It’s a weird thought.

The two of you continue to make casual conversation over lunch, until you find you’ve both finished.

“I’ll cover it. Don’t worry.” She pulls a coin purse out from her satchel and lays the appropriate amount down on the table over the bill.

It’s genuinely enjoyable spending time with Twilight. Despite the position you’re in with her, she doesn’t seem to be too embarrassed to treat you as a friend, too. You can tell your assistance is genuinely useful and that she’s elated to have someone she can share that side of herself with without worry of ridicule.

You part ways when you get back to the castle; Twilight has to leave you to spend some time with her friends. You’re almost sad to be apart from her, even for a few hours, but knowing you have another intimate session coming up this evening seems to brighten your spirits, even if what you’ll be doing is still quite disgusting and grueling.

You find yourself caring a lot less, though. Back when you arrived the idea of being anywhere near pony gas made your stomach lurch, but you realized now that it really wasn’t so bad. It still smelled pretty horrible, sure, but it made Twilight happy, and it gave you a chance to be as intimate with her as possible. In a weird way, you spend the rest of the afternoon looking forward to your evening session.
11111211111.title: Lunch time!

111112111111.content:
At around half six in the evening, just as you were getting into a book you’d borrowed from Twilight’s vast library, you look up to see your door open, and Twilight’s head peek round.

“Hey, Peppermint! Study time!” She announces, as if it’s already routine for the both of you. It’s only the second day, but in a way it is.

It’s a lot less alarmed than yesterday, too, which at least means her gas won’t be quite so bad.

You follow her into her room again, looking just as it had this morning.

“I hope you haven’t been too bored!”

“Oh, no, I got lost in a book.”

She giggles. “I know that feeling all too well.”

She routinely takes a seat on her “throne” again, using her magic to open a large, old, leather-bound spell book.

You shortly get into your box again. There’s less dread now that this whole situation is more familiar to you; you figure that experiencing her worst gas on your first night has meant you’re now more quickly-adjusted to an average night of her studying.

“What a day!” She sighs. “Pinkie Pie and Applejack were having some silly argument about setting up the Ponyville county fair for this weekend, and it took forever for them to come together and use both their strengths combined. It was hard not to just intervene, but you’ve got to let ponies work things out by themselves sometimes.” She rambled. It didn’t really mean anything to you, but you still listened, happy to hear Twilight tell you about her day.

Predictably you hear the tight, airy hiss of a fart coming from above you. Looks like it’s started.

You get to work, but unexpectedly, the smell hits hard. Much harder than you were prepared for, and you begin to cough and splutter uncontrollably.

You thought a healthy, light lunch would result in slightly better-smelling farts, but evidently it just made them infinitely worse.

At hearing your violent reaction, Twilight quickly gets up from the seat and peers down into it.

"Are you okay!?"

But just like yesterday this backfires, and the smell of her own gas reaches up and punches her in the face, too. You see the visible shock and disgust contort over her features as she also breaks into a coughing fit.

"Holy Moly!" She manages, rummaging around in her drawer and producing a wooden clothes peg, hastily clipping it over the end of her muzzle and spraying another half can of air freshner.

"I guess healthy eating only makes it worse."

You suddenly feel a whole lot less confident about your ability to withstand another studying session, but you grit your teeth and instruct Twilight to sit back down again.

She hesitates for a moment, clearly a little worried about your wellbeing, but does as you tell her and blocks your view once more with her butt.

It's not long before another windy fart blows into the box surrounding you. You try to mentally prepare, and then sniff.

It isn't as sickening as last night's curry farts, but it's definitely a lot stronger and sharper, practically burning the inside of your nose. It's like a hot, humid, vegetative odor of steamed cabbage or broccoli. It's hard not to gag, but you manage to hold it in.

"Just let me know if it's too much, okay?" She tells you, embarrassed, and gets back to work.

Another piping hot fart blows against your face a couple of minutes later, which you obediently inhale. It's bracing, but once again you manage to hold it in, exhaling it back out through your mouth and feeling it burn just as much on the way out.

The rest of the study session continues much the same as it had the night before; the frequency of the gaseous outbursts is definitely less, but the sheer potency of them makes it feel like it lasts a lot longer.

By the end of the session, you're feeling a little dizzy, but mostly okay.

"Thanks, Peppermint. You did great." Twilight's eyes lighten up as she waves you out of her room, though just before you can leave she calls out again.

"Wait! There's one last one!" She says, panicked, and you hurry over to where she's standing by her bed, dutifully getting up behind her and lowering your muzzle directly to her asshole. You feel a warm spray of silent gas flood your nostrils directly, and sniff as hard as you can, letting it burn deep in your lungs.

She seems even more impressed by this display, once more wishing you goodnight and letting you head to your own bed.
111112111111.title: The evening comes

1111121111111.content:
Your morning routine goes much the same way as it had yesterday; another under-the-covers session with Twilight, once again making an effort to edge yourself closer and closer and inhale her gas directly from the winking ring it spawned from. Again, it was difficult, but something in you wanted to do the very best job you could for Twilight.

Her farts weren't as obnoxious as they had been yesterday; for last night's dinner she had eaten something fairly mild, which manifested itself in her morning farts with a cloying, potent smell like sulfuric cabbage. It was definitely gross, but it was also becoming easier to withstand it.

After you'd attended to her morning duties, which seemed to be a lot less than the day before, you once again parted ways with Twilight, letting her head to take a morning dump and leave you to preoccupy yourself for another day. You decided a walk around the castle grounds and the outskirts of Ponyville could be nice; after all, you'd still barely explored the town around you, or even the rest of the castle for that matter.

Twilight came to visit you just before lunch.

"Hey, Peppermint." She showed herself in to your room.

"I wanted to let you know I'll be busy for most of the day. I have some special visitors coming for a dinner later, so if you could help clean up the dining room, that would be great!"

"Will you still be needing my services this evening?"

She smiled. "Oh, I think so. I'll see you later."

You kept yourself busy for the rest of the day, doing a little cleaning, taking a little stroll around the grounds, and before you knew it, the evening had come.

You looked out from your bedroom window as an ornately-decorated carriage descended down to the entrance of Twilight's castle, and inside, to your surprise, sat princesses Celestia and Luna. You almost had to rub your eyes to assure you weren't seeing things. It was the real Celestia and Luna. You'd never seen them before in person, though it was no surprise Twilight was having this calibre of guest to dinner.

A few moments later, Twilight came to your room.

"Hey, Peppermint. I'm sure you saw them arrive, but I have Celestia and Luna here for a meal."

"I saw them. I'm a little star struck." You chuckle nervously. She grins.

"Well, I thought I'd let you know that I'll come to visit you a little later on. Looks like there's quite a feast prepared so I'm sure I'll be needing your assistance."

With this, she leaves you again, and apart from a guard coming by to give you some dinner, for the next two or three hours, you're left alone in your room.

Eventually, you hear a rapping at your door, and call for whoever is outside to come in.

It's Twilight, only, she's not alone.

The moment you see Celestia and Luna behind her, you fix your slumped posture and sit up, attentively, not wanting to seem like a slob.

"This is Peppermint Swirl?" Celestia asks Twilight, stepping past and into your room. You're still a little in awe that Celestia herself is in the same room as you.

"Yep! Uh, Peppermint, I hope you don't mind, but we got talking about your... position here, and Celestia and Luna wanted to meet you."

Luna entered the room, too, checking you out as if you were on auction and she were considering buying you.

"And... he doesn't mind it?" She asked Twilight.

"Well, It can get a little stinky sometimes, but Peppermint does a perfect job." She seems a little embarrassed to be discussing this in front of the Princesses. You wonder how it managed to come up in conversation in the first place.

"Peppermint," Celestia addresses you directly, "How would you feel about me and my sister... trying out those services of yours."

You were speechless for a moment.

Luna interrupted. "It's just, I believe we had a little too much to eat. Neither of us really want to stink up the carriage on the ride back to Canterlot. If you don't want to, then we would understand."

Twilight shares a look with you, as if she hadn't fully expected the princesses to ask something of you like this, either.

You don't feel like you can really turn them down, though. The chance to serve beneath Celestia and Luna, in whatever capacity, seems a once in a limetime opportunity.

"I'll help." You tell them, and immediately their eyes light up.

"He really is willing to do this!" Celestia exclaimed to Twilight. "I almost thought you were joking."

"Nope! Peppermint is the best assistant I've ever had! He's already been through the wringer with me." Twilight blushes to herself.

"In that case," Luna begins, "Let's not waste any time. My stomach feels unsettled to no end."

Celestia, Luna, and Twilight advance towards you. You remain seated on your bed and watch as Celestia and Luna turn around in front of you, pointing their illustrious, clean, royal bottoms to you as Twilight gets up onto your bed and aims her rump towards you, too; you feel yourself blushing at the sight of three sets of genitalia in your face in every direction; firstly, Twilight's familiar rear end. Then, Celestia's wide, pristine-white, perfectly rounded plot. Finally, Luna's smaller, but shapely cheeks where her dark, winking plothole and marehood sit beneath her tail.

You don't have long to think about it before the first fart is produced. It comes from Celestia, a loud, raspy blowing fart that raises slightly in pitch as it releases. You hear her sigh contentedly.

Deciding to handle this job in the same way you had for Twilight, you lean towards her rump and inhale. The smell is immediately dizzying and unfamiliar to you; almost musky in a way, and somehow smelling like something you shouldn't be smelling at all. Celestia's personal smell. It's unique in the same way that Twilight's is.

Soon after her sister's ass bursts with a softer, quieter wet fart that gently ripples and rips moistly for a few seconds.

You lean towards her and get a sample of her aroma. It's different, too; earthy and pungent like aniseed but with a thick, eggy smell to it. You find yourself coughing as your facial features contort in instinctive disgust.

"It sounds like my fumes are too much for him." Luna laughs to herself, but you assure her you're fine.

Celestia lets rip again, followed almost instantly by Twilight. The two fart sounds collage together, and pretty soon the smells hit you from two sides; you can sense the familiarity of Twilight's smell. It's a little scary that you've inhaled so much of her gas that you can pick it out, but it's almost overpowered by the sheer musk of Celestia's. You decide leaning in towards each posterior is probably not worth it, as Luna, too, lets out another wet rambling fart.

You remain in the middle, hearing fart sounds blast out around you from every direction; the odors combined are definitely something strong, and you already feel your eyes watering from inhaling them.

The farts continue to come, overlapping but each pony having their own unmistakable sound and smell. It's a strange, dizzying experience but you do your job and stay in place, sniffing loudly and trying to keep your dinner down as the concoction of pony gas grows stronger and stronger.

Interspersed amongst the variously-toned farts are soft, feminine grunts and sighs of relief from the three princesses. Some of the farts are short, staccato pops or cracks; some are long, windy, squealing trumpety plumes of acrid gas that only add more to the swarming cloud of effluvium.

You become more and more lightheaded. Usually it's only Twilight's farts you're inhaling. Three different ponies all at once is something entirely different, and your oxygen becomes deprived much faster.

The sounds around you eventually seem to just merge into one mosaic of fart sounds, but you can sort of tell which pony is letting off which ones. Twilight's are more frequent, but shorter, and have a potency that cuts right through. Celestia's are mostly longer and windier, with a smell that seems weirdly personal to her. Luna's are also long, but much wetter and not as loud. The smell, though, has just blended into one. You can barely even pick out individuality in it anymore; it's just a thick smog of sulfur and methane and chokingly sour.

You really do begin to feel lightheaded, like you might pass out any second, but Celestia and Luna seem to be finished.

"Oh, I feel a hundred pounds lighter!" Celestia coos softly.

The two sisters turn to look at you, but Twilight doesn't seem to be totally empty.

"Twilight? You still have more, after even all of that?"

You turn to see that Twilight has sunken into a downward dog position, her rump raised up and her head resting against your bed.

"Just... a little more." She says, still clearly embarrassed.

A mischievous smile seems to spread across Luna's face. "Why don't we see how good Peppermint really is at this?" The sisters share a glance, and in only a few seconds you feel their hooves against the back of your head, guiding it towards Twilight's rump.
1111121111111.title: You awaken the next morning

11111211111111.content:
You're held only about an inch away from Twilight's butt, watching her hole pucker as you already had so many times.

A pert, shrill, trumpet-like fart blurts out from her ass, and she lets out a stuttered gasp.

"I think he needs to be a little closer if he's going to get it all." Luna says sadistically, and you feel a push against your head, forcing you to make contact with Twilight's butt. She looks round, seemingly as surprised as you are.

The smell this close up is as strong as it can be. At this point it's hard to even make out any particular resemblance to anything; it's just strong, smelly gas. Almost like the smell of petrol, or burning rubber.

Still, you do as you're told and take in a whiff. It seems to only make you twice as lightheaded, and you feel a headache form in one side of your head.

Twilight pushes out another fart, this one half-muffled by your face and hitting you directly with an irritating stench that makes you cough.

"In fact," Celestia starts, "Why don't we make sure he gets all of it? See how good his tolerance really is?"

This time you feel Celestia's hooves move from supporting the back of your head to grabbing your jaw, squeezing your muzzle and forcing you to open your mouth through pursed lips.

Luna then applies some more pressure from behind in a precise way, and you can feel that your mouth is open and around Twilight's asshole, Sealed around it.

Twilight seems just as shocked as you, looking up with eyes that seem to ask if you're ok. The main thing that concerns you is passing out on the job, which it seems is dangerously close to happening. The room is already swirling and dancing around as if you're drunk, and you feel like it would only take a couple more farts to knock you out completely.

"I-I'm not sure how much more I have." Twilight calls up to Celestia.

"I'm sure you can push at least one more out, Twilight." Celestia's soft, comforting voice comes back.

The purple alicorn nods and you can see on her face that she's pushing as hard as possible.

Only a few seconds later a fart blasts out into your mouth like a warm air canon, but in the shock of the unfamiliar sensation it simply forces itself out either side of your lips.

"No, no." Celestia says to you, "That's not how you do it. You're letting it all escape." Her tone is strict but at the same time weirdly assuring. You're so dizzy it all feels like a dream to you, anyway.

"What you want to do," She begins, as if she's giving you some kind of lesson, "Is swallow the gas as it enters your mouth. It'll feel good."

"Or, you could breathe it in." Luna suggests.

"No. I think that would be a bit too harsh for his lungs. They're clearly still not fully accustomed to gas yet." With how bizarre this whole situation is, you ask yourself if you really are dreaming.

"Got one more, Twilight?" Celestia asks, and Twilight nods silently.

"Then make this count." She tells you.

After a few more seconds, a low, rasping fart floods your mouth with a hollow, gulpy noise.

Trying your best to do as Celestia says, you suck the gas to the back of your throat and swallow it, as if it's a mouthful of water; gulping it down.

You can physically feel it travel down your gullet and to your stomach. It's possibly the weirdest thing you've ever experienced, but as soon as Celestia feels satisfied, she and her sister release their grip and you fall down onto your back, watching the ceiling spin around you.

You soon see Twilight looking over you, concerned. "Peppermint? Are you okay?"

"He'll be fine." Celestia assures her. "He just needs a little fresh air."

You hear the window open with a creak, and feel the cool, rain-tinged night breeze drift in. It's wonderful. It feels like a gallon of water after a week stranded in the desert.

"Anyway," Celestia starts up again, "I think it's time for dessert."

The ponies leave, but Twilight looks back at you one last time to check you're ok.


After a few minutes of filtering the farts from your lungs, you begin to feel better. The lightheadedness subsides almost instantly, and you're able to sit up again.

Not soon after, the door knocks once more. Your heart drops as you expect to see the three princesses back for round two, but it's just Celestia on her own.

She approaches you.

"I hope you're feeling better, Peppermint. I apologize if me and Luna got a little carried away. It's been hundreds of years since we've encountered a pony willing to attend to... such private matters." She pauses for a second. "I'll get to the point. We were just talking, and me and Luna were remarking how nice it would be to have a pony like you around our castle back in Canterlot. As you can imagine, like Twilight, we find ourselves in need of assistance often. Don't feel compelled, but I wanted to ask if you'd consider coming back with us and resuming your job at our castle."

The offer comes as a surprise. You're not sure what to say.

"Of course, if you feel you have a duty to remain here serving Twilight, then I'll understand, but if you would like to come back and work for us, we'd provide you with everything you have here. We have one of the finest chefs in Equestria."

You pause for a moment. You'd only been working with Twilight for three days, and already the two of you had seemed to secure a bond. On the other hoof, working for Celestia or Luna seemed like one of the highest honors imaginable. They may have been a little more extreme with their methods, but they clearly still understood when they had pushed you too far.

"Which of you two would I be serving?" You asked, still toying with the idea in your head.

"Well, we could perhaps do a trial period of sorts. Me and Luna naturally work at very different times, so you could alternate between the two of us. After a week or so, you could choose one of us to serve permanently."

She looked at you, waiting for an answer.

"Twilight's okay with this?"

"She said that if you made this decision, she'd still understand. I'm sure she'd be over to visit more than once, anyway."

It was time to decide. It seemed like even with a lifetime to think it over, it would be difficult to choose, but after about a minute, you go you decide to...
11111211111111.title: Things get more intensive

choices: You notice your member is beginning to stiffen between your legs
111112111111112.content:
"I'm sorry, but I need to stay here with Twilight." You tell Celestia, bowing your head, and she nods silently.

"I understand. If you ever change your mind, ask Spike to send us a scroll. We could always use an assistant as diligent as you."

With this, she leaves you alone in your room, and a few moments later you see her carriage leave from outside.

There's a knock at the door a few minutes later.

"Hey, Peppermint."

It's Twilight. She smiles warmly as she enters your room.

"I'm glad you decided to stay here."

"I couldn't leave you when you need my assistance so often."

She blushed. "I'll leave you for the night. You've had a pretty... exhausting evening. You need some rest."

That's certainly one word to use, though extreme would probably be more accurate. There's a certain sense of relief in having chosen to stay with Twilight; you could tell the other princesses were a little more... unforgiving in their methods. Even if you were made to inhale her noxious fumes, Twilight was at least a little more understanding.

You turned the light out and rolled over into bed, falling fast asleep in just a few moments.



You awake softly, feeling a comforting warmth of the morning sun across your face. The hectic session with Celestia and Luna the night before now feels like it happened a thousand years ago; you're here, still with Twilight. Everything feels good.
