"This should cover your journey home. Sorry for wasting your time. If you ever happen to reconsider, please send me a scroll." She offers you a smile, though you can tell it's very forced.

The princess wordlessly shows you down to the front entrance.

"There's a stallion with a cart just on the edge of town - past the town hall. He'll take you home."

And with that, you see Twilight's sunken face disappear behind the castle doors.

The weather seems to correspond with your situation as you walk across town; the blue sky has suddenly become a collage of grey clouds, and a light rain begins to patter on the ground around you.

Just as Twilight said, there's a stallion resting against a wagon, peering up cautiously at the sky, shielding his face from the incoming wind.

As you approach, he looks down to you.

"Where do you wanna go, pal? Rates are on the side of the wagon here."

You take a look. Weirdly, you feel as if you'd rather be any place but home right now. You realize that you only have enough bits for one journey, and even then the locations much farther afield are way out of your price range anyway.

"Well?" He presses, and you examine the list again, picking out three options you can afford.
11112.title: Gross! You decline.

choices: Finding something to eat in the restaurant district
111121.content:
Canterlot.
The crux of sophistication.
The crown of nobility.
The residence of the Princesses.

What better place is there for a wayward stallion who's just turned down the opportunity of a lifetime?

As you pay your fare and enter the carriage, that decision really begins to weigh down on you.

Have you made a horrible mistake? You can't shake that disappointment so present in Twilight's eyes as you declined.

You're not a horrible person, are you? Surely not; she was crazy to assume just anypony would be willing to smell her farts and worship her ass day in and day out.

Though, you find that as you arrive, and begin aimlessly walking around the city, those ideas swirl and congeal in your mind.

Is... it all bad?

You're not sure why, but there's a little voice in your head that's telling you you missed out. Not just that - telling you that you want to smell Twilight's farts.
You have to be going crazy. It must just be that nagging feeling that you've missed out on something special.

You can't really be finding yourself interested in the prospect, surely?

It's probably a good idea to put an end to your aimlessness and find something to do.

A few options seem to present themselves, but you settle on...
111121.title: Canterlot

choices: Starlight let out a huge fart
You heard a voice from upstairs, Twilight is back early!
1112.content:
You collided with the mare as you went around the corner, both of you letting out a surprised gasp. You knew for certain this wasn't Princess Twilight, judging from her appearance and what you had been told this must be Starlight Glimmer, Twilight's other assistant! For a brief moment you were worried, having remembered stories about her old, quite nasty self, but she had been reformed now! Surely that was all behind her, she was supposed to be kind now. You put on your best smile and apologize, trying to explain the situation as easily as you can. "Oh sorry about that! I'm Peppermint Swirl, I tried the door but there was no answer so I-"

Before you could explain further, Starlight had overcome the surprise of bumping into a random pony in the castle and cut you off. "You think you can just let yourself into the castle like that?" She asked, eyeing you suspiciously. You were about to speak up, but she suddenly realized the room you had exited from. "Wait a second... You just came out of our archive room, that is a very restricted area of the castle! You're what tripped the alarm spell!" She narrowed her eyes at you, her demeanor shifting to a very threatening one. "What were you doing in there? There are ancient, priceless scrolls and spells in there!"

"I- umm but.. I just-" You stammered, unable to speak properly as she pressed towards you, backing you up against a wall. You always really sucked when put under pressure like this, you tried to find the best way to explain despite it all. "I just let myself in... to see Princess Twilight, I'm-"

"Oh! To see Twilight! Right...." She rolled her eyes. "If you wanted to see her, you would have waited for an answer at the front door like any good, law abiding pony would. You broke into a highly restricted area, filled with priceless spells! Are you one of those criminals who steals ancient texts and spells and sells them off? Or perhaps you wanted them for yourself?" She glared as you gulped, this was turning out so very, very badly...

"No! I just need to see Princess Twilight I-"

"Enough! I am putting you under arrest!" Starlight snapped as she cast a spell, binding your legs with a magical rope that left you completely immobile. "Twilight's gone for a bit, but I can handle you while she is gone. You *will* tell me everything... Twilight mentioned a black market for rare spells, is that who you're working for?!" She asked, though not even giving you a chance to respond as she enveloped you with her magic and brought you down a flight of stairs, to the dungeon of the castle. You were getting more worried by the second, and every attempt to speak was a stammering mess of words. If you could just get Twilight, she could explain everything! Starlight seemed very dedicated to her job, and you were quite frightened at what she would do to what she thought was a spell thief that broke into the castle. You were brought into a room and put behind a table while Starlight looked at you from the other side. "Now, tell me. Why did you break into the archive room?" She glared at you with a stern look, her blue eyes completely fixed on you. Just as you were about to speak up...
1112.title: Suspect

choices: Starlight uses her farts to interrogate you
Starlight continues questioning you like this
11121.content:
A loud, rippling fart from Starlight Glimmer cut you off and dragged on for a few seconds. At first you thought it had to be the table scraping against the ground or something, she couldn't have possible farted! But the putrid smell hitting your nose seconds after confirmed it, she had most definitely ripped a huge fart. The relieved expression on her face also gave it away... "Oh, oh my... excuse me." Starlight blushed a bit as you were gagging and trying to turn your head away from the awful smell, quite clearly disgusted from her gas. "My lunch doesn't seem to be agreeing with my very well... perhaps those layered bean burritos were a little much." She said nonchalantly as you were choking on her fart, which had very quickly filled the small room you were in. If your hooves weren't tied up tightly, you would have been holding your nose and fanning the air to avoid the terrible smell. Hell, you would have ran as far away as possible from this stinky mare!

"T-that stinks so badly! I can hardly breathe, it's so thick!" You gag and sputter, the stench of her cheesy burrito gas burning your nostrils. "I didn't break in! Twilight's... assistant..." You manage to get in between your breaths.

Starlight's expression turned back to an annoyed one, as she seemed to just ignore her massive fart (something you desperately wished you could do) "Yes, I AM Twilight's assistant..." She asserted, you guessed she must not have gotten the memo about you, or simply didn't remember... "And yes you did break in! Twilight set up an alarm spell that would get tripped if somepony came in, you set it off. Tell me... what were you trying to steal?" She slammed a hoof on the table, already getting quite impatient.

You groaned as finally her gas seemed to be dissipating, letting you slowly recompose yourself. "I just need to see the Princess... I'm no thief!"

"I will be the judge of that, and so far you have been proving quite guil- ugh, excuse me again." Starlight groaned as she let out a silent fart that was even worse than her previous blast. Almost immediately the stench hit you and you were bucking and struggling as much as possible, you couldn't handle the smell any longer. "Let me out of this room! Your disgusting farts are going to kill me!" You plead as your sense of smell was overwhelmed by the stench of her rancid gas.

"Kill you? Come now... they're bad but not THAT bad." Starlight coughed a bit as her silent fart wafted up to her, that was a really stinky one... But it was just gas. She was certain mere flatulence couldn't kill a pony, no matter how bad it was. "Now stop whining and tell me what you were doing!" She demanded, getting annoyed at your continued resistance as you just couldn't respond, you were far too busy choking on the toxic air that the room was now full of. Seeing your completely disgusted expression and your hatred of her farts was giving her an idea though, albeit it was a nasty one. Perhaps she would require more extreme methods to get you to talk...
11121.title: Starlight let out a huge fart

choices: You resist and try to wait for help
You 'confess' to get her to stop farting
111211.content:
A devious smirk crossed Starlight Glimmer's face as she decided what to do. Sure it was an incredibly disgusting thing to do, especially for a well mannered mare such as herself, but she was determined to get you to talk, even if that meant utilizing less... professional methods. Starlight had read a book or two on interrogation, and so far you had been proving rather stubborn to the talking approach, so she decided to step it up. One of the tips that came to her mind was to take note of things the suspect hated and use it against them. In this case, it was clear to her you absolutely loathed her farts and wanted to be as far away from them as possible. She blushed a little at the idea but nonetheless continued, a little embarrassment on her part was worth busting a criminal like you. "I see you are still refusing to cooperate. Very well, I know just what to do. This should effectively deal with two problems at once!" Starlight said as she got up, making you more than a little scared at the thought what she could be doing.

Your fear quickly turned to confusion as you saw the mare get up on the table, the legs squeaking a bit under her weight. What in the world could she be doing up there? Almost immediately that question was answered and your heart sunk as Starlight spun around, her rather large behind now facing you. No... she couldn't... she wouldn't! "P-please no! Don't tell me you're going to-" You yell and plead as you watched her lean her head forward, pushing her butt out further and as close to your face as possible. Once her ass was mere inches from your face she cut off your begging with another putrid fart, the warmth of this one was much more apparent due to the proximity. The heat wasn't the only thing that was stronger, the smell was even worse than before, something you hadn't thought possible! The disgusting fart spluttered on for a few seconds, making you feel rather nauseous.

"Oooooh, now that's MUCH better. My tummy has been acting up a bit, so I hope you don't mind if I just stay right here and let all my gas out." Starlight snickered as she watched you gag and heave on her latest fart, you look much more sickened now that you were closer to her ass. "I should warn you, it's going to get VERY stinky back there. So, why don't you make this easier on yourself and tell me what you were trying to steal? Cooperate with me, and I will keep you far away from my ass. Refuse to and well..." She let out a small, unfeminine grunt as her cheeks parted and another warm, smelly fart blew directly onto your face.

While there wasn't a mirror in here, you were fairly certain your face was turning a little green. The stench of her farts was sickening (it also didn't help you were forced to stare at her pink, sweat covered asscheeks and crack. Not the prettiest sight in the world) and you knew you couldn't take much more of this before passing out. "Sweet Celestia, the SMELL! Please! I'm not a thief!" You yell out as you choked on her gas, the after effects of all those beans she had eaten filling your nose. "I'll do anything, no more farts!" You beg, tears running down your cheeks from the gas irritating your eyes. This response didn't seem to please Starlight in the least as she just glared back at you and forced out another paint peeling fart, this one even blowing back your mane a little. It seemed like you would be smelling her poots for a long while unless you confessed to a crime you didn't commit... even then, who know's what Starlight would do to you once you actually confessed...
111211.title: Starlight's Gassy Interrogation

choices: Go and find the source of the lemonade
Grab a bite to eat in the restaurant district
Go and ask a pony for directions to an inn
12.content:
Journeying further into town, the crowds grew around you. The sun was at its very peak above you, and the mid-day crowds swarmed the market stalls, the shops, and the public spaces.

As you stood in the center of the square, you looked around you at what was on offer. There was, of course, the option of finding where that lemonade was coming from, you were certainly getting more and more thirsty, but before you could decide on that your gaze fell on a bright pink candy-covered facade which almost appeared to me made from gingerbread, cake and candycanes. Ponies were coming out with cupcakes, candy, and various other sweet treats. The prospect of that did seem appealing.

There was also the market itself, the beginnings of which you could see winding around down a road to your left. There would certainly be some interesting things on sale, and perhaps even something to beat the heat.

Browsing a little more, you spotted what appeared to be a day spa a little farther away. Though the idea of a steam room in this heat seemed ridiculous, maybe they’d have a pool or something. You could certainly use a nice spell of relaxation after your long journey.

Finally, there was the option to simply go and find a hotel or an inn now and book a room for later. You couldn’t see any where you were standing, but you were sure you could ask somepony in the town square to direct you.
12.title: Into the heart of the action

choices: You’re so thirsty! You drink it before paying!
You give her the bit and be on your way
121.content:
You searched among the crowd until your eyes landed on a purple mare serving glasses of lemonade. You could feel the chalky texture of your dry throat, your tongue pleading for something refreshing to abate the effects of the summer sun.

Rummaging through your satchel, you produced a small coin purse, giving it a rustle to make sure you had even one bit inside. In fact, you had three.

The lemonade was only a bit for a glass, so you managed to wade through the crowds and sidled up to the stall, the mare’s grinning face greeting you.

“Would you like some lemonade?” Her voice was as sweet as the drink she was selling. Your eyes wandered to the berry cutie mark on her flank, wondering for a second whether she ought to be selling grape juice instead.

You nodded, slightly out of breath, and she poured some lemonade from the glass, letting a couple of ice cubes tinkle against the rim.

“That’ll be one bit!” She announced enthusiastically, outstretching a hoof in your direction.
121.title: Sweet, sweet lemonade

choices: You wake up, unable to move, in a different location.
1211.content:
You realize suddenly that your throat is like coarse sandpaper. The walk must have really gotten to you, as when you try to even swallow, it's as if no saliva can be produced. Your intense thirst takes over, and without thinking about it you yank the glass of lemonade from the mare and gulp it down in seconds.

She stares, mouth agape, for a few moments, before decidedly shifting into an angered scowl.

"Hey! You pay for it first, thief!"

Any remnant of her bright, friendly demeanour seems to have dissolved entirely, as she barks angrily at you.

"Sorry. I was just so thirsty, I have-"

"No! I've seen this trick pulled a hundred times before. Your money is fake. You just did that so you can hand me a false bit, run off and by the time I've realized, you're gone."

"No, I swear! My money is-"

"Bullshit." She says fiercely. She's really convinced you're a criminal. It would have probably been better to just pay her first.

"If you try and run I'll call the police! We need to do something about your punishment."

Punishment!? She hasn't even given you a chance to offer her your bit!

"Really, you can have all my money if you want to make up for th-"

"Enough. You can try to save your flank all you want, but I've already had stock stolen by low-life criminal scum like yourself. Looks like I've finally got one of you right where I want you."

"Look, I'm here to work with-"

"I said enough." She silences you. It's obvious no matter what you say, her mind is already made up. Maybe when she's cooled down it'll be easier to make her see reason.

She heads back behind her lemonade stand and prepares another glass of lemonade, only into this one she squeezes a few droplets from some strange looking vial.

"Okay. Now this one's on the house. Drink it all." She slides the glass towards you, a malicious smile crawling over her face.

So now she wants to drug you? You're not even sure what the hell it is she put in the drink. Still, it's obvious that there's no convincing this pony. You take the glass and begin to drink it.

"All of it! Don't leave a drop!" She slams her hoof against the stall, getting the brief attention of a few passing ponies.

You reluctantly finish it off, placing the empty glass back down.

"What was that?"

"Don't worry." She smiles, "In a few seconds, you'll have a pretty good idea."

Before you can ask her a further question, you begin to feel strange. Your senses start to numb, and your eyes grow unnaturally heavy.

"Wh-What...." You try to say, but before another word can even leave your mouth, you fall asleep.
1211.title: You’re so thirsty! You drink it before paying!

choices: Ignored you, continuing to push harder until she soiled herself.
Miraculously agreed, and came to unlock your cuff.
12111.content:
You find yourself awake, your head throbbing and your heart immediately palpitating.

You rub your eyes, find that you're no longer outside, and it's not even daytime anymore. You're inside, In somepony's house, and on top of that, your left hoof seems to be tightly fastened to the radiator behind you.

A thousand questions swarm around in your mind as you sit, helpless, trying to see if there's any way to free yourself from the hoof cuff, but it's on way too tight to get it off. Even if you managed to, you'd probably tear your skin off with it.

You tried to piece together as much as possible from before you fell asleep... you remembered the lemonade stand; the light-mulberry mare who forced you to drink the lemonade spiked with... something. Whatever it was, it had put you out for what had to be some time.

At that moment, the door clicked and swung open. As you expected, the same mare was on the other side, off-kilter and dishevelled; a wide, silly grin was planted over her face as she waltzed inside and slammed the door. Even without the strong alcoholic smell she was giving off, it was clear she was very drunk.

"Ooooh, heyyyy." She slurred, wobbling over towards you. "Look whooooss awake." Her words came out slow and messy, dribbling through her lips with an apparent lack of control. What the fuck was going on?

"Look. I'll pay you everything I have. I'm sorry, I didn't mean to-"

But she reaches a hoof out and presses it against your muzzle, silencing you.

"Shhhhhhhh...... ishhht oookayyy. y-Yooouuu didd a baddd thing and yoouu need to be pummisheed...." She paused, realizing she'd said that word incorrectly, but seemingly too drunk to bother and correct it. Instead, she giggled and burped into her hoof, groaning and rubbing her head.

"But noowww thee shhhpider has a fllyyy." She teased ominously, tumbling back onto the floor and then pulling herself back up.

She sighed and then burped again, this time letting it rattle in her throat for about three times as long, covering her muzzle with her hoof and then blowing out through pursed lips. "Ughh.. That tassteee bad." Her face collapsed into a disgusted grimace and she fanned her hooves wildly in front of her face to dispel the odor.

"Wiiinne always giveshh me gas." She giggled, forcing out another burp; this one sounding strained and horribly wet. You just hoped she didn't throw up on you and would pass out soon, but even then... you still wouldn't be able to free yourself.

"Good thingg I got my little flly here.." She alluded to you, reaching a hoof down to stroke the underside of your chin. With this, she quickly leaned in even closer, her muzzle level with yours, and brought up another deep-set belch right into your face, letting it roar out through her lips and right up your nostrils.

You gagged silently as the disgusting stench of whatever she last ate filled your senses. It was as if you'd stuck your nose right down her gullet and taken a whiff of the contents of her stomach.

"Ha!" She exclaimed, though before she could say another word, another round of gas exploded from her - only this time, it was from the other end.

A wet, ripping sound of unbridled flatulence. "Scccuuuseee me.." She started laughing again, standing up straight and, as you had feared, turned to bring her plot right to your face.

Your nose wrinkled up instinctively as she swayed her heavy, unwashed rump in front of you.

"Smell thisss one!" She called out, and brought her weight back onto your face, blasting you with a rippling congested gusty fart that painted your face in a sultry, humid smog.

The smell was even more overwhelming than her burp had been; a sour, sharp eggy smell. Every breath just brought more and more of the stench into your lungs.

"Oooh, that was wett!" She commented, proudly, and started to smear her sweaty, dirty plot against your face, leaving a sticky, smelly gloss of sweat over it like a snail's trail. This was about as hellish as you could imagine a situation being.

She was clearly too drunk to even really know what she was doing, but somehow you sensed that she'd be administering a similar punishment even if she were sober.

"Whasss wrong? Too smelly?" She asked you rhetorically, and then started to make loud, forceful grunting sounds, her abdomen tensing up rock hard with her asshole still pressed against the tip of your muzzle.

She pushed out another fart, with as much force as she possibly could, making it outpour with a loud, vigorous ripping noise that pummelled against your face, forcing vibrations through your nose and mouth. She seemed to push even harder still, grunting with more desperation, and increasing the pressure of her putrid release, forcing the sound to raise up into a squeal.

After a good five seconds she cut it off, collapsing onto the floor in a breathless heap. "Wwwooww.. that wass loud!"

You couldn't really focus on what she was saying, though. The smell was far too potent and offensive to even hear her. It took all you had to not throw up, your stomach reeling uneasily. The only air around you to breathe was tainted by the revolting presence of her gas.

She stayed laying down on the floor on her belly, seemingly deciding she was too drunk to bother getting up.

Her plot was no longer on your face, but it didn't stop her from forcing out wet, gurgly farts, dribbling out from the slovenly, intoxicated mare in a similar manner to her speech.

"Thheesse feel soo good.." She sighed, almost orgasmically. If she didn't stop soon, you could tell she would end up pushing out more than just gas.

"Wh-Why don't we go get some coffee?" You asked, knowing it would probably yield no results.

"Naahhhh" She said, her mouth half-closed.

"C-Come on. I... I hear coffee gives you really... bad farts." This wasn't true, of course - at least not in your case - but at this stage any possibility of getting her to stop farting and maybe let you out of your cuff was worth trying.

She paused for a second, looking round to you, and then...
12111.title: You wake up, unable to move, in a different loc...

choices: A crowd gathered around a fashion boutique
1212.content:
You hand over the bit and down the cool lemonade.

“Thanks!”

Now you’re slightly refreshed, it’s a little easier to focus, though your focus seems to be drawn to...
1212.title: You give her the bit and be on your way

12121.content:
You'd noticed the impeccably-designed boutique before, but it seemed to have suddenly become a popular spot; a large crowd of ponies swarming around the entrance. They seemed completely glued to a podium raised slightly above ground level, on which a pristine white unicorn was showing off a series of dresses, some fitted onto mannequins and one being worn by herself.

You headed over, trying to bob and weave through the crowd to get a better look at what was drawing so much attention.

"You heard me right! I'm looking for a new assistant, and one of you lucky ponies has the chance to fill that ever-coveted role! Oh yes, I'm serious; a position alongside THE Rarity! You'll get all the insider knowledge about how I make my dresses: my process! I'll be selecting a name randomly from this wonderful new sun hat I designed just last week, and yes - before you ask, they are available for purchase."

You wouldn't want to neglect your duties with Twilight, but you decided it could be fun to throw your name in anyway. You weren't even sure who this mare was - it seemed like her clothing was pretty famous around here - and it could be interesting to find out a little more about her.

You pushed and shoved your way over to a tall, elegantly silent mare with a carefully-trimmed mane, who handed you a piece of paper and a pen.

You quickly scribbled down your name and handed it back to her, watching as she tossed it into the hat and then handed it up to Rarity.

The unicorn peered down into the hat, using magic to shuffle around the pieces of paper.

"Who will be my lucky new assistant? Let's find out!"

She closed her eyes and drew a single piece of paper from the hat, holding it up in front of her face, unfolding it, opening her eyes, and announcing that the winner was...
12121.title: A crowd gathered around a fashion boutique

choices: Grit your teeth and head inside
This mare is crazy! Run as fast as you can and get out of there!
121211.content:
"Peppermint... uh... Squirrel?" She called out. Fuck. Your handwriting never was very neat.

"Seal? Swine? Uhmm... I'm afraid I can't quite make out that last word."

You raise your hoof.
"Uh.. It was me. Peppermint Swirl."

The unicorn looks down at the paper again.

"Ah, yes. Swirl. I suppose that's almost what it looks like. You win!"

You hear the crowd around you grumble and look around to you, clearly having never even heard of you before.

Rarity, meanwhile, grins down to you. "Please, darling, head inside. I'll just wrap things up out here."

You do as she says, heading towards the entrance to the boutique itself, turning back to see Rarity dispel the crowd.

"Show's over, folks. Unless, of course, you'd like to buy something in my new summer line? Starting at only 670 bits!"

They don't seem too interested, though, all splitting up and still visibly upset they weren't in your place.

"Oh, and don't forget I'm hosting an auction later this evening at Canterlot! I expect to see you all there!"

She then heads in after you, closing the front door to the shop behind her and letting out a heavy sigh, almost like a rock star heading backstage after a concert.

"Peppermint... Swirl, was it? It's nice to meet you! I'm Rarity, but I'm sure you already know that!"

Actually, you probably wouldn't know that if she hadn't told you, but you shake her hoof anyway.

"I don't believe I've seen you around Ponyville before - are you new?"

"Yeah. I just arrived today. I'm here to work with the Princess."

"Oh! Twilight? Yes, she did mention something about a new assistant... hm. I'm sure we can work some arrangement out so that you can still help me around here. She's a good friend."

You wondered if maybe you'd gotten yourself in a bit too deep; not only did you have absolutely zero expertise with dress-making or fashion, it could be a bit tricky being assistant to two ponies. Still, you were here now, so you had to make do.

"Anyway! I have the auction later, so there's much to do! Not a second to waste!"

She started heading upstairs but you called out to stop her.

"What... exactly is my job going to entail?"

She stared at you for a second. "Well, assisting me, of course. I have a lot to do to get ready and I need some help. Would you be a dear and grab a glass from the kitchen?" She pointed to a room off to your right.

"Uhm... I'm not exactly very experienced in dress-making."

She laughed. "Oh, heavens, no, you won't be making any dresses. No, no, you'll just be my personal assistant. Don't worry. It's about time for my lunch, so this is as good a time as any to give you a little test."

She continued up the stairs, pausing for just a moment, a quick flash of discomfort surfacing on her face.
"Actually... maybe grab a plate while you're at it."

With this she trotted upstairs, leaving you to get the plate and glass. You wondered why exactly she was going to eat upstairs, but didn't think too much of it.

Picking up a knife and fork as well just to be prepared, you headed upstairs, but immediately you were a little confused. There was no sign of Rarity anywhere.

The Upstairs of the building was an open-plan bedroom, only one door on the far side of the room which you could only assume led to the bathroom. There isn't even any table to speak of up here.

Just as you were about to try and look downstairs again, you heard a voice.

"Peppermint? Is that you? I'm here. Do be quick, won't you?"

You scanned around for the sound, suddenly freezing in shock as you realised the voice was coming from behind the bathroom door.
121211.title: You

choices: That it’s time for the main course
That she’ll let you sit out of the next part as it’s your first day.
1212111.content:
You decide you’re in far too deep to simply give up and run away. Besides, she told you she was good friends with Twilight. You might jeopardize your chances with the Princess if you can’t even attend to Rarity.

You push open the unlocked door to see the mare in even greater discomfort than before, hoof over her belly as she sits, legs splayed, on the toilet bowl.
There’s already a humid, foul odor in the room, and it’s not hard to take a guess at where it’s coming from.

“Ah. Here you are. Just in time.”

The situation already seems to explain itself, but you need some kind of verbal confirmation to know you’re not just going crazy.

“I’m sorry, but what do you want me to do exactly?” Your voice quakes.

“Oh. Silly me, I didn’t even explain! I suppose by this point it’s nothing out of the ordinary to me, but for someone new...” she pauses, clearly wanting to hurry things along.

“There’s only one way a pony keeps herself in such good condition. I’m sure you’ve already noticed my perfect skin, my flawless mane... they don’t just get this way on their own. People try eating and drinking all sorts of things for their health, but I’ve stumbled on the one true method for maintaining absolute physical perfection!”

She doesn’t exactly need to explain what that is.

“You... drink your own pee?”

"Take the tube outta my butt and I'll show you!" You can tell by the slightly strained tone to her voice, and her bloated, bulging lower abdomen, that she's pretty full up.

You carefully remove the tube from her with a wet popping sound, hearing her cautiously moan and gasp as she tries her best to keep the mixture contained within.

"O-Okay... now grab the last piece of equipment and put it in."

You're wondering what she's referring to at first, but looking back to the kitchen counter, hidden behind the bag of flour, is a large, rubber, obsidian-black butt plug. Of course.

Turning off your senses as best you can, you ease it into her asshole, watching it gape to accept its girth.

"Aghh." She gasps. "Good. Now, it's time for the mixing."

She carefully rolls onto her back, making strained, laboured grunting noises as she does so, and reveals her pudgy, distended belly to you.

"Okay. Just... give it a rub to mix those ingredients up nice and good."

"Wait.. what? Me?"

"Well, who else would I be talking to, silly?" She giggles, her energy reduced.

There's really no way out of doing this, is there? You get down to the floor, reaching over to Pinkie and very gently massaging her belly. You're surprized to find it's taut; almost rock hard, so utterly filled to its limits that the walls of her colon are pushed to their extremes.

You decide to rub at each side, watching Pinkie's face distort at the sensations.

"G-Good job." She grunts, biting her lip and spreading her legs as she tries to put up with the increasingly apparent desperation.

You continue to wobble and slosh her belly, that lets out more and more pained noises of digestion and irritation. It's pretty obvious it wants to void itself of all the cake mixture inside as soon as it possibly can. It's probably not a good idea to leave it much longer.

"Okay. That's good. Now get a clean bowl."

You quickly rush to get a mixing bowl - the largest one you can see - and meanwhile Pinkie gets herself back onto her hooves, assuming a similar position to before with her rear raised up towards the ceiling.

"H-Hurry! My tummy's really starting to hurt!"

You assume a position behind her, bowl primed and angled so there won't be any spillage, and, taking a deep breath, you reach forward and pull the butt plug out.

Without even half a second of delay, her asshole distends and spews out the thick, gloopy cake mixture like a torrid, gushing eruption.

Pinkie gasps, almost orgasmically, as the dark brown batter spews from her in a violent stream, making a wet, choking sound like a blocked pipe.

You struggle to keep the bowl in the right position as the batter fills it up rapidly. As the unwavering volley continues, you can see that her belly is shrinking in size just as quickly as the mixture is pouring out.

"Ooh, yeahh.." Pinkie moans, tongue lolling out. Clearly she's enjoying this a lot more than you are.

The stream begins to abate gradually, but, to your shock, something more than cake batter passes out from her anus; a lighter brown, runny matter that you can only assume - by the horribly sour smell now afflicting your nostrils - is poop.

Well, at least none of it got on-

schhlllaarpp

Before you have a chance to wonder what she means by that, the mare comes up to you and licks over your face and upper torso, cleaning you up, but in possibly the least hygienic way possible.

You're left with a sticky, bad-smelling film of saliva all over you. It's hard to decide if this is really better than before.

12212.content:
“Food it is!” Pinkie announced, probably just as rapturous as she would have been if you’d gone with the other option.

“What do you feel like? Hayburger and fries? Extra cheese burrito? Pizza? Pasta? Ooh! Or we could just go grab a bunch of snacks from the store and chow down on those!!”

You were overwhelmed by choice, and the rate at which Pinkie was listing it off to you, so quickly agreed with her last suggestion.

“Good choice, Swirlie!” She chirped, hoisting you by the arm out the front door to the bakery and led you across town to the small supermarket.

“Don’t worry - I’ll pay for it all.” She told you, casually throwing a steadily growing mass of snacks, candy and soda into the shopping cart she had you pushing along.

You wondered how even two ponies could feasibly eat this much, but you didn’t doubt Pinkie Pie had something of a mammoth appetite.

The trip round the store didn’t last very long, and once she’d cleared the shelves of just about every unhealthy food item the store stocked, you both headed to the counter to pay.

Your eyes pulsed wide as you saw the final price flash up on the mechanical cash register, but surprisingly Pinkie paid for it in full, and didn’t seem to even remotely care that she was throwing away so many bits on junk food.

You were soon back at Sugarcube Corner, where Pinkie led you up to the second floor. The majority of the space consisted of her bedroom, which was surprisingly bare and plain for a pony who seemed to like to make an exaggerated effort in every other area.

Pinkie dumped the pile - though it was more of a mountain - onto the middle of the floor, rubbing her hooves together as she licked her lips.

“Oh, boy! What should we try first? There’s too much to choose!”

You sat back on her bed, observing silently as the energetic pink pony pulled out two bags of chips, throwing one to you and then popping hers open with a squeeze, pouring the contents down her throat, barely even crunching or chewing.

You feebly took nibbles at the bag of chips, but the way Pinkie continued to guzzle down snacks and pour entire bottles of soda down her gullet in one go put you off eating at all. How could a pony - especially a mare - eat like this? It was unnatural.

She let out a short, loud belch as if it were just something to get out of the way to clear more room for food, and resumed her insane binge; you had scarcely finished half of your bag of chips and she had seemingly devoured half the pile of snacks she had supposedly brought to share.

“Oh, Sorry! I’m just so hungry!” She giggled with a full mouth, spraying little pieces of chewed up food everywhere.

It was hard to not notice that her stomach had visibly increased in size, too; bloated and protruding out as it tried desperately to contain the huge amount of food she had stuffed into it - far more food than any mare, or even stallion, should eat in one sitting. Probably even one day.

A slow, lazy burp dribbled through her lips as her shoulders sunk and her body seemed to recline back, her belly sticking out even more.

“Oh, wow! Looks like I ate all that a little too fast, huh?” She prodded at her bulging belly, and then, seeming to have suddenly thought of something, looked up at you.

“Seeing as you’re my assistant here now... maybe you could help me out a l-little?” Her demeanour had quickly changed from perky and hyperactive to reserved and strained, letting out hefty breaths and another full-bodied burp.

“Help? How?”

“Maybe give me a little rub. Get it moving through me. I think I got some chips stuck in my throat.” Her features contracted into an expression of slight pain as she thumped her hoof against her chest, rattling out another long, masculine belch.

“Oh, boy...” she sighed to herself.

She was clearly struggling to digest all the food she had crammed into herself, unsurprisingly, and though it really wasn’t your duty, you got down onto the floor, scootched up next to her and gingerly began to rub her belly.

“Oh, no. You’re barely doing anything. You gotta really massage it deep.” She told you, grabbing your hoof with her own and guiding it forcefully further into her taut, balloon-like belly.

“Oooh, yeah. That’s the spot.”

You continued to apply pressure, rubbing in a circular motion. It felt strange, but it seemed to be helping her somehow.

She turned to you, mouth opening and only a second later a deep, noisy belch came through it, sounding as if it had originated deep down in the depths of her stomach.

You were hit with the smell of warm garlic, and recoiled, nose scrunching up in an effort to close out the stench.

Then - to your surprise - Pinkie reached over and started picking up even more food from the pile. It wasn’t with the same veracity as before, but startlingly she seemed to have room left to stuff more and more down; whole packets of chips, entire bags of candy corn, huge bottles of drink.

“Pinkie? Are you sure you should..”

“Pssh! Don’t you worry about me!” She assured, but you could feel her stomach growing in size gradually with each item of food she forcefully made it take in; you felt like it could genuinely pop at any second, but she seemed determined - for some strange, undisclosed reason - to eat everything in sight, and after what had to only be five minutes, she had.

The gurgling, whining groans from inside her stomach only got more and more disgruntled, like a snared animal growling and desperate for release.

She held her hoof up to her mouth and spewed out another grisly eructation, which you felt vibrate through her entire torso.

Her breaths had become even more laboured, too, and mustering all the energy she had, she slid herself over to sit against the wall.

Her eyes were half-closed, her expression suggesting she was trying to just focus on digesting the unhealthy myriad of snacks currently struggling to break apart in her stomach.

“I gotta fart... so bad.” She smiled, and this immediately send your blood cold.

“I wanna let it b-brew for a little more, though. I want this to be one impressive ripper.”

Did this mare have no shame?

She turned to you, eyes flashing with competitive excitement - muted, but still apparent.

“Could you go grab me the bag of hot chilli chips we have in the cupboard?”

“Uh... what?” You couldn’t believe she could fit even another crumb inside her; her stomach was so utterly filled to the brim that it felt rock hard.

“D-Do it.” She repeated, overcome by stomach pains as her belly protested and grumbled away at her again.

She clearly wasn’t going to change her mind, so you made your way downstairs and soon found the chips she had mentioned. They were really going to finish her off.

You heard her unleash another monstrous burp as you came back up the stairs. She was still collapsed against the wall, her hind legs poking out either side of her enlarged tummy.

She snatched the bag from you and poured the chips down her throat carelessly. You could tell that from the moment they reached her stomach, the reaction was not good. Her eyes perked open, her stomach bubbling and burbling even louder, the sound travelling down further and further.

“Quick! Get over here!” She gestured to her belly, which you promptly found yourself trying to rub again.

You watched her left eye stutter and close, and her face contorted.

“T-Time this one f-for me.” She managed.

Then, the floodgates forcefully opened.

The stall was covered in small amplifiers and turntables, as well as a couple of crates of records, all dusty and seemingly unplayed.

“Hey! Anything you like the look of?” The mare asks brightly, pulling off her headphones, from which loud electronic music plays.

“Just browsing.”

“Trying to sell some of this junk so I can get the new T-260 dual directional desk.” She paused. “I mean... this not-junk.” her facade fell short.

“I’m only like 200 bits away! My roommate isn’t exactly happy about me getting it, but I went along to that stupid solo concert thing, so it’s only fair! Can you believe they played just a cello for three hours!?” She pauses, realising she’s lost you, and tries to pull herself out of her rambling.

“Sorry. I’m Vinyl Scratch. Don’t think I’ve seen you before, although I don’t go outside all that often.” She snickers to herself, picking out one of the records and looking at it.

“Yeah, I just got here. I’m supposed to be working with Twilight Sparkle.”

“Oh really? The Princess? You must be pretty fancy, huh?” She looks up at you, scratching her side.

“Not really. She was looking for assistants, so I just applied. Figured it’s an interesting job at least.”

“Hm. You know... I’ve kinda been looking for somepony to help me out with this little sting I’ve got planned.”

“Uh... sting?”

“Well, my roommate, Octavia, has more money than I do. She does fancy parties in Canterlot and stuff, but there’s no way she’d give me 200 bits for a turntable. however.. She’s also been saying that I make too much mess at home, and how she wants to hire a cleaner, sooooo...”

She nods suggestively, but you’re not really following.

“So, if I got her to hire somepony like you as a cleaner, you could secretly siphon the money to me, taking a cut for yourself, of course, and I could have the T-260 in no time! It’s genius, right?”

“Uh... you want me to be your cleaner?”

“Well, no, it’s important that it’s Tavi who hires you, but if you could come back to our house and show her how good you are at tidying, I’m sure she’d hire you! I mean, if you really want to still do that whole Twilight gig, I won’t stop you, but if you help me out with this, I can share some of my food with you too! I know the best veggie chilli dog place! Think of it as a chance to see the real nitty gritty of Ponyville!”

choices: Keep the money and sneak out
Sneak into Vinyl’s room and try to get some revenge
12321.content:
After a few seconds you settled on going along with Vinyl’s plan - you figured although it wasn’t exactly Twilight Sparkle, you would be getting paid for doing it, and there was a possibility you could still go and be Twilight’s assistant if it didn’t work out. Perhaps you could send her a scroll asking if your starting date could be delayed?

“Sure!”

The mare grinned. “I knew you’d go with the smart choice! This is gonna be great!”

She looked around, realizing there wasn’t really anybody gathered around her stall anyway, and packed her stuff up.

“Just follow me. I’ll tell her I found you in town... just do... cleaner-y things, okay?”

You weren’t exactly sure what that meant, but it was probably easy enough. You’d always had a knack at cleaning and washing up, so it wouldn’t be anything too difficult.

“How will we split the money?” You ask, hoping it’s not too forward.

“50/50! I’m a fair pony! Octavia has a bunch of money saved up so she won’t mind parting with some of it.”

The two of you arrived at the mare’s shared home, and Vinyl gave you a quick glance before knocking on the door, as if reminding you to stick to the plan she had outlined not ten minutes ago.

The door opened, a brown, neatly-dressed mare peering round sluggishly.

“Forgot your key again, Vinyl?”

“That doesn’t matter. I found someone! A cleaner!”

The neater mare, Octavia, looked round, as if she hadn’t even noticed you were there.

“Oh! Hello! Sorry, I’m rather tired. Do come in.”

You put on a warm face and entered the home. Vinyl immediately headed towards the sofa and crashed out, dropping her box of junk down onto the floor.

“I’ve been asking Vinyl to find a cleaner for some time now - as you can see, this place needs desperate attention. I don’t have the time to clean up, and Vinyl doesn’t have the... stamina, shall we say?”

The house didn’t look particularly messy so far, apart from a few empty bottles and food wrappers left out on the coffee table.

“Well - it’s mostly her room.” Octavia gestured her eyes towards Vinyl and then back at you.

“Oh, it’s not that bad!”

Octavia rolled her eyes. “So, what’s your experience?”

You stammered for a second. “Uh... I did some cleaning jobs in Canterlot.”

“Ooh! I’m there often - it’s such a nice town, isn’t it?”

“Y-Yeah!”

“You must be rather skilled at cleaning in that case! Are you able to start immediately?”

“Sure!”

“And does 200 bits seem to be a reasonable fee?”

“A week?”

“No, a day.”

200 bits a day!? You noticed Vinyl look up in alarm, the smile on her face growing even bigger.

“That sounds... adequate.”

This mare really did have a lot of money. You wondered why she was still sharing a house and didn’t just buy one of her own.

“Oh, perfect! Well, if you’d like to get started on Vinyl’s room. I just need to pop into town to grab something for dinner.”
Before leaving she leans in and whispers to you; “Keep an eye on her.”

With that, she leaves you and Vinyl alone.

“Yes! It worked! I knew Tavi was loaded but 200 a day!?”

It would be nice having some money. As long as you let Twilight delay your starting date, there’s no reason why this can’t work out rather nicely.

However, you remember that you need to actually clean up Vinyl’s room.

As you pry open her door and step inside, it’s immediately apparent that Octavia wasn’t at all exaggerating; the place is a pig sty.

Dirty laundry and empty food wrappers are strewn carelessly across the floor, so much so that you can barely see the surface of the floor itself. The bed sheets are stained and randomly scrunched up over the mattress.

It’s hard to imagine a single pony could let their room get to such a state, but considering you’re getting paid, you grin and bear it and get to work.

It’s laborious work, and even after twenty minutes you’ve hardly made a dent in the clutter. You’re roused by a knock at the door, peering into the lounge and noticing Vinyl has her headphones on, lounging lazily on the sofa with one arm draped over the side.

You start to wonder why she’s even getting 50% of the take, but it doesn’t look like she’s going to even hear the door, and you go to answer it yourself.

“Uhh... food delivery?”

Noticing the door’s open, Vinyl finally looks round and pulls her headphones off.

“Hey! My burritos are here!” She pushes past you and grabs the paper bag.

“You can cover the cost, right?”

You grumble under your breath and gather every bit you have on you, handing them over and closing the door.

This mare is really starting to get on your nerves; you agreed to go along with her little plan and so far she’s being a total slob while you clean up her room for her. You wonder if the money is even worth it.

With the day not getting any younger, you decide it’s best to return to cleaning. You’ve already filled three black bags with trash and you’re not even halfway there.

After a while you start to get into the hang of cleaning up and it seems to go by marginally faster. Twilight wouldn’t have you doing anything as demeaning as this.

You’re almost finished, deciding to finish with cleaning the dirty wood-panelled floor, down on your knees and scrubbing the surface as well as you can.

Vinyl trots over and you look up at her.

“Hey, I’ve been baking something up for you!”

Huh. Maybe you misjudged her.

Before you can thank her, she swivels around - about as swiftly as you’ve seen her move this entire time - and reaches a hoof back to push your head into her ass.

FRAAAARRPPP

She lays a hot, awful-smelling fart on your muzzle and lets you free, laughing to herself like it’s the funniest thing she’s ever done.

You rub your nose, feeling the putrid gas right in the back of your throat. You’ve gone from being annoyed by this mare to hating her.

“Whew! Burrito toots are always the smelliest!”

She trots back into the main room, leaving you with the cloud of stink to clean the rest of her room.

You just finish up your job, silently cursing her in your head as you do so. It’s strangely motivating.

Not long after you’re finished, the door opens and Octavia arrives home, pausing as she passes by Vinyl’s room.

“Oh, wow! You’ve really done a number on this room! Oh, I hardly recognize it.”

“Thanks. It wasn’t easy.”

“Mind you, I’m sure it’ll be back to how it was in a matter of days, but thanks all the same. I’m glad we hired you!”

You’re a little impressed you made such good work of such a messy room, but it’s left you exhausted, and you sense Octavia can see this.

“Oh, I completely forgot to mention your sleeping arrangements. We have a spare room. It’s rather small, but cosy!”

She leads you to it; it’s not much bigger than a closet, but the bed inside is very comfortable, and you’re certainly not planning to stay here long at all.

You hover around for the rest of the evening, occasionally picking up little pieces of trash or cleaning surfaces.

Octavia is even kind enough to feed you, but Vinyl Scratch doesn’t get any better.

Throughout the entire evening she continuously passes gas casually and nonchalantly. It’s as if she doesn’t even understand the concept of manners. Octavia steps in to voice her resentment of it every time it happens, though this doesn’t seem to get through to Vinyl.

To make matters worse, at the end of the evening she announces she needs to “go take a monster dump” and marches upstairs to the bathroom, as if it’s some important event everypony must be aware of.

Octavia gives you your money as promised. It’s a bit weird being paid by the day, but you’re not complaining.

After a long and irritating day, you find yourself in your temporary bed and restless. You’re tired, but you just can’t settle.

Not able to put up with things any longer, you decide to...

With your envelope stuffed into your satchel, you creep out into the main lounge. The house is still and all you can hear is obnoxious snoring coming from one of the rooms. You assume it’s Vinyl.


You’re not sure exactly how to get back at her. You pause for a moment and try to conjure something up. This mare doesn’t even care about anything, so what could you possibly do to ruffle her feathers?


You remember the sheer amount of clutter you tidied up in her room earlier; most of it was trash, but there were some assorted electronics and DJ equipment. Maybe you could swipe something and sell it on. She probably wouldn’t miss it.


It’s risky, and for a moment you consider just leaving now and never returning to this place, but there would be some satisfaction in knowing you’d had the last laugh.


You keep your footfalls as silent as possible and head towards her room. The door is already half open so you slowly push your way inside.


Surprise surprise - it is her snoring so loudly. She’s sprawled out over her bed, bedsheets basically halfway off the bed.


The room smells pretty funky, too. A humid stench of body odor.


The mess has already started to return, too. You don’t see how this could be possible but... whatever. You’re here for only one thing.


You notice the pile of music equipment is on the other side of her bed. Great. You can’t just walk up to it and swipe something, you’re going to have to lean over her to get it.


You take a deep breath and wipe your brow. Once you’ve got this, you can get the hell out and never look back.


You begin to quietly bend and stretch over Vinyl’s sleeping self, keeping your breath held as you stretch your arms out as far as they’ll go.


You peer down at her, laying on her stomach. She even looks like a slob when she sleeps, a little pool of drool accumulating around her mouth.


You can see a microphone that looks like it could be worth something. It’s probably the lightest and easiest to carry thing there, too.



You reach out a little closer... closer... until...



brrrrrppp

It smells even worse than the one she made you smell earlier. All the food from the day settled in her stomach in one disgustingly sour cocktail.


It affects your concentration and makes it much harder to stay in your poised position, but you manage to, and grab the microphone.


Yes! You begin to bring it back towards you, making sure you’re still hovering over the sleeping pony, and then...
