1232121.content:
The first thing you feel is pure shock and confusion, and all of a sudden the pain in your side rushes through your body. You drop the microphone and crease up, falling straight forward on top of Vinyl.


You’re able to look up for a second and see a sinister smile before she grabs her unkempt bedsheet and pulls it over the both of you.


“You little fucking thief!” She calls out, still monitoring her voice so Octavia doesn’t hear her.


You really have no answer.


“I knew you were up to something, so I pretended to be asleep when I heard you come in. Pretty good acting, huh?”


You can barely even take in what she’s saying to you, still reeling from the sharp pain in your side.


“Not only were you going to steal from me, you were going to make a dash for it with all the money! What happened to our agreement?”


There’s a rush of movement and a flash of light and somehow you find yourself laying on your back with Vinyl’s legs either side of your head.

You look up to see she’s straddling your upper chest, leaning back so her nethers are directly in your face.


“It’s time to teach you a lesson, thief.”


Before you can even utter a word she blasts another repulsive fart into your face. The toxic fumes are like poison, making you cough loudly as you try to rid your nose and mouth of the appalling odor.


“Oh, I’m gonna have fun with you.” She snickers to herself. You feel like calling out to Octavia in the hopes she might hear you and come to your rescue, but you don’t even want to imagine what Vinyl would do to you in that case.


Peering up you can make out her fierce eyes through her messy hair in the dim light of the room.


There seems to be something... shiny... a strand of something, but before you can think about it too much you find out what it is: a wad of saliva that splatters into your face. It reeks.


“I’m going to make you hurt.” She says again. You don’t doubt it.


Your brain is a rush of emotions and panic as the mare forces out yet another fart into your face, this one sounds wet in the most horrible way possible, bubbling moistly from her asshole and covering your face in a thick hot fog that smells like all the awful junk food she’s digested throughout the day fermented and churned in that belly of hers.


“You like that? Brewed specially for you.” She snickers again, rocking herself back and forward and leaving a film of sweat and mucus from her pussy and ass all over your upper torso.


The smell has already made you lightheaded and oxygen deprived, the room spinning around you with her face still smiling down.


She leans down, head getting closer and closer to you and brings up a wet belch to blow right into your nostrils. It’s much sharper than the smell of her farts, and brings you to involuntarily gag.


“Good one.” She says under her breath.


You wonder exactly how much more of this you can take. The air in her room is already heavy and humid, so even if you didn’t have farts and burps flooding your nostrils, you still wouldn’t have much air to breathe.


She notices you’re just on the brink of passing out, and of course she doesn’t want her torment to be cut so short, so gets off you and off her bed. You hear her rummaging through her drawer, but you’re far too dazed and in pain to try and see what she’s doing.


The answer soon comes to you in the form of a prick in your side, which causes you to sit up immediately and scream, though just as you’re about to scream, she covers your mouth with her hoof. You look down and notice in her other hoof she’s carrying a small knife to you.



“Calm down. I’m not gonna kill you." There's a pause. "Well... not unless you try something stupid."

Celestia, now she's literally threatening you with a weapon!

"D-Don't hurt me." You manage, as if that would have any influence.

She just grins. "I won't, as long as you do what I say, understand?"

You nod, still dizzy and in shock.

"Prove it. Sniff this."

You expect her to flash her flank at you and blast you with another fart, but instead she raises the arm not wielding the knife and reveals the matted jungle of hair under her arm.

You don't exactly need to get any closer to sniff it, as the tart odor already reaches you.

"Go on. I won't ask again."

She points the knife at you in a jabbing motion, and you realize you should probably just do it. It's hardly any less humiliating than what she's already subjected you to.

Feeling yourself shaking, you lean in closer, aiming your muzzle towards her armpit and inhaling as softly as you can.

"Oh, come on! That's not a sniff! I want to hear you snort."

You hold back tears and do as she says, drawing in a violent, audible snorting sniff. Instantly you gag as the vile sweat-laden aroma fills the back of your throat.

You reel back and start coughing uncontrollably, which only seems to bring a wider smile to Vinyl's face.

"Good. Now lick it."

Teary-eyed, you look back up at her desperately. It's not even worth trying to put it off. Maybe there'll be some chance to tackle her and get the knife, but right now that isn't going to happen. You have to submit to her whims or you have no doubt she'll cut you. Maybe even kill you.

You bring your head back towards the bush under her arm, extending your tongue and touching it to the hair.

"No! Lick it! Get it nice and clean!"

It's clear she won't accept any feeble attempts, and try to shut off your brain as you lap at the greasy, salty, bitter unwashed hair.

"Now suck on it."

The lump in your throat only gets heavier as you follow her command. There's no way to stop the dry heaving as you suckle on the sweat-drenched bush.

After what is probably five seconds but feels like five years, she lets you stop.

"There. Now I know you can be trusted."

You feel your stomach lurch as you realize there's at least one piece of hair stuck between your teeth. It's hard to not throw up, but that would probably just anger her more.

"Okay. Now we're gonna make things a little more interesting, thief. Nice and slowly."

She gestures you to get up from her bed and you do so, still holding the knife mere inches from your side.

"You lead. We're going to...."
1232121.title: She suddenly wakes up and kicks you in the side

12321211.content:
You feel your heart drop.

“Come on. Get moving.” She applies the slightest amount of pressure into your back with the knife, just so you know she’s serious.

You lead the way out from her room, but before she guides you up the stairs, she pauses quickly and makes a detour to the kitchen surface.

“Just in case things are a little blocked up.” She smirks, taking a carton of prune juice and then continuing to prod you with her knife in the direction of the stairs.

You gulp, not even wanting to bring yourself to imagine what horrific punishment the slovenly pony has in store for you.

At the top of the stairs, she leads you into the bathroom, locking the door behind you both.

It’s surprisingly rather large, considering the relative size of the rest of the house.

Vinyl pulls the small key from the door and then gets you to look round at her as she swallows it with a smirk.

“Looks like there’s only gonna be one way you’re getting that key back.”

You shudder. This mare is fucking evil.

She seems to become a little more lax with the knife, seeing as you now have no way of escaping the room. Even if you were able to squeeze through the small open window, by the time you’d recovered from the fall she would already be outside, standing over you.

Vinyl pauses for a second, seeming to look around the room in thought.

“Hm. Now I’m here, I’m thinking a nice warm bath might help things move through.” She grabbed her belly as she said this, “Could be interesting to see how good you are at holding your breath.” She chuckles pitilessly.

“However... I wouldn’t want to go and accidentally let out any floaters in there. Maybe it’d be best to go straight into the filthy stuff.”

Neither option seems particularly preferable to you, but of course, Vinyl could somehow sense this.

“You know what? I’ll let you decide. Bath, or toilet?”
12321211.title: "The Bathroom"

123212111.content:
"Bath." You decide, thinking to yourself that as horrible as they are, enduring a couple more of Vinyl's farts would be better than her shit. The idea of that really makes you shiver.

"Great. I could do with a nice relaxing bathe. Go run it." She aggressively points to the tub.

You turn on the faucets and begin to draw the bath, watching as she climbs inside, sprawled out, and tells you to get in the other side.

It's not a particularly huge bathtub, so it's not exactly easy for the two of you to fit inside, but Vinyl doesn't care. She reclines back against the wall, letting out a sigh as the warm water slowly fills around you both.

You're startled by a wet, quacking fart you didn't expect, which brattles against the bottom of the bathtub, half covered in water.

"Smell it." She instructs, stretching her hind legs up around your neck and drawing your face closer towards her groin.

The smell is hard to ignore, and seems to only be amplified by the steamy humidity of the bath water. It's the same repugnant stench of what can only be compared to eggs and soggy, steamed cabbage.

"Ooh! Here comes another!" She announces, before bracing herself against the sides of the bath and letting a long, noisy fart bubble in the water which is lapping against her plothole, creating a horrible muddy kind of sound that only makes things more repulsive.

The water continues to rise steadily, and you begin to realise she doesn't seem to be relaxing her grip around your neck anytime soon. As the water gets closer and closer to submerging your head, she simply looks down at you and says, "Hope you can hold your breath long enough."

"Wh-What!?"

She snickers. "Don't worry. You've got my special supply of oxygen to keep you alive."

With this, her legs pull you in closer, dunking your head beneath the water and stuffing it firmly between her thighs.

You begin to panic, realising you can't hold your breath for very long and she has no intention of letting you go anytime soon.

Right in front of you her asshole opens and spews out a stream of glistening bubbles of fart gas, which ripple up past your head and break on the surface.

Your desperation for air growing, your instincts kick in, and despite everything you lunge your head forward, pursing your lips tightly around Vinyl's anus and trying as hard as possible to breathe in the toxic fumes escaping from it.

You feel your mouth fill slowly with a hot outflux of methane. Your initial urge is to gag and spit it out, but you know this is your only hope, and gently try to breathe it into your lungs.

It seems to work, but it's anything but pleasant.

You feel her stench fill your lungs, and while it's no substitute for oxygen, it seems to satisfy your need temporarily, though it leaves you significantly more lightheaded.

You suck down the last few seconds of the fart she's dispensing - under any other circumstance you'd probably be impressed at how long it was.

Lifting your head away as far as Vinyl's tight grip around you allows, you breathe the gas back out, watching it bubble up as her farts had done.

After only a second, though, you feel her hoof reach down and push your head back so you're against her. You once again seal your lips around her pucker and await the next release of gas, which comes after only a few seconds in the form of four or five disconnected bursts that reverberate around inside your mouth.

You struggle to breathe it in, and then breathe out again. You're not sure how long you can realistically keep doing this, but it seems to be keeping you from drowning.

The taste is beyond appalling, though. It's no surprise that her farts taste almost as bad as they smell, and your entire mouth and throat are covered in the flavor which you doubt you will ever truly get rid of.

Drowsy and barely holding on, you desperately breathe in the four second fart Vinyl pumps into your mouth, feeling your lungs shudder at the fumes you're giving them.

After this one, though, Vinyl finally releases her legs from around your neck and lets you bob up to the surface, spluttering and breathing quickly and hungrily.

"Not bad! Kinda thought you'd pass out after breathing in the first one." She smirked.

You had to take a moment to recover from the ordeal. You were still dizzy, and the taste was still singed into your tastebuds, but at least you could breathe again.

"You know what? I'm feeling generous."

You look up at her.

"You did such a good job down there I'll spare you my bowel movements... for now."

You're too disoriented to really give any kind of response, merely glaring at her as she climbs out of the tub, sending one last fart your way and giggling to herself.

"You go wait downstairs while I take care of business."

There's a sudden knock at the door.

"Vinyl? You in there? I was going to brush my teeth."

The unicorn gestures at you to keep quiet, once again grabbing the knife and holding it in your direction.

"Yeah. Gonna be a while, though, sorry."

Octavia grumbles from the other side of the door. "Fine. I'm going to my cello lesson. I'll be back by noon."


After waiting to hear the front door close, Vinyl tells you you can go and wait downstairs.

"Order some food for me, would you? I have a feeling after I drop this load I'm gonna have plenty of room for more." She sits up on the toilet bowl and blasts a long, wet fart into it. You take that as a cue to leave.

You crash down onto the sofa, taking a moment to try and recoup and catch your breath. This mare is completely insane. You curse yourself for ever trying to steal from her. Maybe this is all somehow karma, though you know she would have deserved it.

Deciding there's no point trying to escape, and finding you don't even have the energy to bother, you head over to the table beside the front door and pick up a stack of fast food flyers.

"Uh, Vinyl?" You call up.

"Hnng. Yeah?" She calls back, her voice strained.

"What food do you want?"

"I don't know. All of it."

All of it? You shrug, telling yourself that if you do what she says, she's more likely to let you go at some point... hopefully.

You call up all the places advertised on the flyers, listing off a hooffull of items from each one, and then take another moment to rest. You're almost certain once Vinyl is finished upstairs she'll find some other way to further humiliate and torture you, so having even a minute of rest is much-needed.

After about fifteen minutes, the first order of food arrives, and you pay from the money Octavia had given you. You find yourself not even caring, and just wanting to get things over with.

Eventually, the rest of the food arrives, and conveniently Vinyl seems to finish up and head downstairs at the same time.

"Whew! You're gonna wanna leave that for at least 24 hours. I really put that thing through its paces."

She spots the ungodly heap of fast food on the table and her eyes light up.

"Awww yeah! I'm starving!"

You watch in silence as Vinyl trots over and picks up a burrito, unwrapping it and stuffing it in her maw, chewing without any semblance of manners. You notice she's still brandishing the knife in your direction.

"Gonna take me a few hours to get through all this."

You wouldn't believe a single pony could possibly manage this much food in one sitting, but you somehow feel Vinyl Scratch is just disgusting enough to try.

She sits down on the couch next to you, stretching out and finishing the burrito in just a few seconds, letting out a dry belch and grabbing for something else, but she pauses.

"Wait. Don't think I'm letting you just sit there being lazy."

Here it comes.

"Of course you're not eating even a bite of any of this, but how about you..."
123212111.title: Bath

12321212.content:
With a knife to your back, you reluctantly do as you’re told and head to the kitchen. Once you arrive, the knife pokes lightly against your skin, and you stiffen. “Well?” the unicorn says expectantly. “Don’t just stand there, make me some breakfast!”

It’s still dark out, but sunrise is approaching. You know Octavia will be waking up in an hour or two to get ready for work, so you calm your nerves by telling yourself that she’ll help free you from this insane mare soon enough. In the meantime, you comply with her request, and open the fridge. Inside you spot a carton of eggs and fresh veggies, and elect to make a simple omelette. Vinyl doesn’t appear to take issue with that choice, saying nothing as she follows you all around the room, ensuring the blade stays at your back.

When the meal is finished, you set it on the table and look back at Vinyl. She raises a brow, “Man, you’re a worse servant than I thought. Pull the chair out for me, servant!” She commands haughtily. You grumble with indignance but do as you’re told, and finally feel the knife leave your back as the pony plops her pert plot down onto the chair, looking satisfied. “And get me some milk— and fetch me the salsa!” she orders rudely.

You open the fridge, and pour her a glass of milk before locating a jar of salsa, which is labeled as ‘extra spicy’. You set both items in front of her, and she happily begins to tear into the meal. She eats with about as much grace as you’d expect: zero. You watch her messily gobble up the meal you prepared in remarkably short time, then pats her now-full belly. “Ah... cruddy hospitality aside, you’re not a bad cook .” She comments as rises from her seat. You say nothing in response, refusing to accept the remark as a compliment.

Vinyl doesn’t seem to mind your silence, but returns to her position behind you, once again ghosting her blade along your back. You tense up instantly, heart pounding. Of course, it was wishful thinking to have thought that would be all she’d make you do, but you had still hoped. “Right, let’s go to the living room. I gotta catch up on my shows.” She says, and you do as you’re told, exiting the kitchen.

As if on cue, the mare’s stomach gurgles. “Ooh... I love spicy food, but it doesn’t seem to love me!” Vinyl says. You find it hard to believe the food has already gone through her, but the gurgling is hard to argue. “Good thing I’ve got you here, though! Octavia’s always giving me flack for stinking up the place, so you’re gonna make sure that doesn’t happen by being my personal fart filter.” The vile pony proclaims.

The memory of her previous farts immediately comes to mind, and fear shoots through you. “Like hell I am!” You cry defiantly. Almost immediately, pressure is applied to the blade against your back, pushing it painfully against your flesh and threatening to break it. “Well, I guess I could call the cops and turn you in for trying to rob me, maybe embellish it a little and say you tried to assault me, if you’d rather that option...” Vinyl threatens.

Honestly, you briefly consider it, but sigh in defeat and resign yourself to your fate. “What do you want me to do...?” You mumble begrudgingly, and you can feel the mare’s satisfied smirk over your shoulder. “Get on the floor and lay with your head face-up on the cushion.” She instructs.

Saying goodbye to your dignity, you do as you’re told and sit on the ground in front of the couch, head on the cushion behind you. The sight of her perky, white plot filling your field of vision has fear washing over you. She’s got you completely at her mercy, and settles onto your face roughly, legs straddling your head as she picks up the television remote and casually flips through the channels.

The smell of her ass is already not pleasant, unsurprisingly for a pony with such poor hygiene. It reeks strongly of musk and sweat, and your muzzle is seemingly the perfect fit to slide right into the horrible cavern of her crack. She simply sits for a good ten minutes, stomach bubbling and groaning ominously. After a bit, she begins to shift, wiggling atop you and positioning herself so that her disgusting asshole now makes full contact with your poor muzzle.

“Hope you’re ready down there!” Your tormentor smirks down at you below her. The puffy button of her anus pulses against your muzzle, each flex of the rubbery muscle filling you with dread. After sufficiently teasing you for a good minute, the bud on your nostrils opens up and unleashes all hell.

BBBBBBBZZZZZZZZZZRRRRRRRRRRRRR

Vinyl’s fart buzzes harshly against your muzzle in an embarrassingly bassy noise, buffered by your pinned nose. You can’t really focus on that aspect however, as the smell is immediately funneled up your nostrils. This fart is perhaps the most repulsive yet, smelling heavily eggy with a hint of rotten vegetables. Despite your best efforts, you thrash and buck instinctively as your entire head is pumped with the reeking gas. She only laughs and bares down harder on your face, wiggling her hips and effectively rubbing your poor nose in it.

“Oh man, that was a weak one, too.” She cackles obnoxiously. “You’re gonna have to do better than that, slave! I can still smell that!” Vinyl complains when the eggy reek reaches her. Biting her lip and clutching her tummy, she pushes another raunchy blast of methane, injected directly up your nostrils. You buck and thrash as she fumigated the interior of your head with her reek, but she simply holds you in place, allowing you to go nowhere.

“Vinyl...?” You both hear a voice from down the hall— Octavia’s. Panicked, the mare perched on your face grabs a blanket hanging on the back of the couch and drapes it over her lap, effectively covering you up. “Don’t you dare move a muscle.” She whispers, flexing her sphincter over your nose threateningly.
12321212.title: "The Kitchen"

123212122.content:
"Oh. You're up early." You hear Octavia's more refined accent coming from somewhere in the kitchen. She clearly hasn't noticed the fact you're pinned beneath Vinyl Scratch, and while you could probably alert her, you know Vinyl will only make your situation worse if you try anything.

"Yeah. Just woke up and felt like having some grub." The unicorn answers, still balancing on your face and pinching the tip of your muzzle with her tight, sweaty plothole.

"Of course. The only reason you'd ever be awake at an hour like this." Octavia yawned, preparing a cup of coffee for herself.

Vinyl rested against the back of the sofa, pulling the heavy blanket up around her abdomen so you were concealed completely, reaching her hoof down to reintroduce the knife against your side.

"Hm. Where's that cleaner... Peppermint?" She asked sleepily, taking a sip of coffee and coming in to the lounge where Vinyl was.

"Not sure." The unicorn feigned ignorance. "Something about catching the market before it got too busy."

Octavia bought her improvised lie. "Well, I have a cello lesson in a few minutes. I hope you'll be able to keep the house from becoming a bombsite until Peppermint returns."

"Pssh. You have so little faith in me, Tavi!" She grinned. You could tell the omlette and salsa were working - or rather not working - through her digestive tract; whining gargles and rumbles coming from her stomach.

She readjusted her plot over your face, distributing her weight to her right cheek, and, to your shock, silently eased out a hissing fart against your nose; a slow, sultry, concentrated stream of gas brushing against your muzzle and filtering into the only space it could find to occupy: your nostrils.

Your teeth gritted together and the back of your nose burned as if you'd just poured acid into it; a painfully raw feeling that seemed to spread all the way down the back of your throat. The overwhelming stench of sulfur and rancid veggies filled your entire self. You couldn't cough, or retch, or gag, and you certainly couldn't struggle.

Suppressing the instinctive urge to even let out a piteous moan, you just sat in silence and let the smell wash over you, every breath only bringing more of the pungent fumes into your lungs and seeming to never lessen in intensity.

This was the kind of torture you wouldn't wish on your worst enemy. There had to be some way of alerting Octavia to your presence without making a sound, but the more you tried to find one, the more hopeless the situation seemed.

You could hear Octavia get up from the other couch and head back towards the door. You started to panic, realizing your chance to be rescued was about to disappear completely.

Your thoughts were interrupted again as Vinyl's anus distended out, opened up, and laid a wet, rumbly fart onto your face, barely even shifting her weight to let it out freely.

"Vinyl!" Octavia called out, disgusted, but the unicorn merely laughed.

"'Scuse me." She chuckled, but once the smell hit your senses it was impossible to focus on anything other than it.

Tears welled in your eyes, stinging as if you'd just cut up a batch of onions, and the need to gag was harder and harder to subdue.

"Whew! That one was ripe!" Vinyl called out, still laughing at how much it seemed to make Octavia squirm. You couldn't believe even a particle of this gas could possibly have gone anywhere other than under the blanket and in your nose.

"Well, I'll take that as my cue to leave. Just don't do... that... on any of my cushions."

Moments later, you hear the door open and shut, and almost immediately Vinyl lifts the blanket up and off of you again.

"I'm impressed. Such a stinky fart and you still kept your cool."

Now that Octavia had left the house entirely, it was as if any attempt to hold back or be quiet had vanished, and Vinyl pushed yet another fart out against your face, this one dribbling out with little force, as if your face planted between her cheeks was stopping the flow from coming out any faster.

You felt a wet, warm sensation cover your face, flowing up into your nostrils again and hitting you with another wave of the appalling methane.

"Ughh... that one felt wet!" She announced, proudly, and shuffled herself around over your head, wiping her leathery, sweat-covered perineum across your face.

Your head was throbbing, one side of it aching from lack of oxygen. Maybe if you were lucky, you'd pass out shortly and not have to endure this torture any more. You realized, though, that even if that happened, as soon as you re-awoke Vinyl's plot would be staring you in the face and ready to administer more gas. There was really no way out.

"I gotta say, you're a good fart cushion. Wouldn't be surprised if you were one of those freaks who enjoyed this." She goaded, a smug grin fitted firmly in place on her face.

If there was anyone deriving any sort of pleasure from this, it certainly wasn't you.

"Can't say those eggs agree with me, though." She grunts, and effortlessly plants another wet stink bomb directly onto your face. "Suck that one down, fart slut!"

You have no choice. The only alternative is to not breathe at all, and while that sounds preferable, you know Vinyl will follow through on her threat of violence if you disobey her orders.

Settling on some music channel on TV, the unicorn pulled herself off of your face, laying down on her side lengthwise along the sofa, then patting her plump buttocks to tell you to get your face closer.

"C'mon." She pressed when you paused, still in shock, "I got a really nasty one brewing. Don't think I can hold it much longer."

Feeling like you were on the verge of tears, you tried to tune out the nausea and disgust and turned your head around so that it was lying on the couch cushion and facing her unwashed white butt. It was scary how even looking at it sent a shiver of fear through every corner of your body; knowing that it could go off any second and the resulting smell would only mean another surge of sickness and pain.

Her legs seemed to wrap around your neck like a snake pulling you closer into her trap. She reached a hoof back and grabbed hold of one of her doughy cheeks, her stomach tensing up as she pushed another cluster of gas through her system.

A slow, droning fart purred through her cheeks, making them almost vibrate slightly, and she squeezed the two fat-pillows together with her hoof, tonally shifting the long, rumbling fart into a low, wet sputter. Applying more force, she grabbed the asscheek and folded it out, once again modulating the timbre of her release to be louder and brighter; bursting out like a trumpet and sending a hot, stale wind gusting against your face. This change in sound seemed to amuse her, and she jiggled her asscheeks together rhythmically, creating a wet, sporadic, choking sound that only made her laugh more.

The flow of gas ceased and she sighed, mouth open and tongue lolling out. "Much better." She told herself, her voice drenched in satisfaction.

Meanwhile, the smell had gotten no easier to sniff down, still eliciting a potent desire to vomit, but you had to hold it down. You didn't even want to imagine what would happen if you ended up throwing up all over her. She'd probably kill you on the spot.

You heard Vinyl's voice calling down to you, stirring you from the dizzy haze you now laid in, and though it took a second to really comprehend what she was saying, you heard...
123212122.title: Octavia does not notice you

choices: She wants to record a little more.

1232121221.content:
Vinyl gabs your hoof and drags you where she wishes. A microphone comes into view. Vinyl is adjusting it so that it’s just a few inches from her ass and your face. After she’s satisfied with its position, she lifts he ass up off the stool, sticking it out towards you. Alas, you know it doesn’t work, as you can both smell and feel the greasy ring now resting on your lips. It’s a truly sickening feeling— rubbery and filthy— that you don’t know if you’ll ever be able to forget

It is picked up by the microphone, and the indecent expulsion loudly sputters from her professional-quality speakers, made bassier by the curvature of your mouth. ssssssssssssssSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSssssssssssssssssss...

With seemingly no trace of pity, she laughs upon noticing the way her rectal fog fumes from your nasal cavities. And this fart merely contributes. Your sinuses are packed full to their capacity with this mare’s awful reek, and it’s still not enough, as she continues to pump more intestinal gas into your head, watching with a highly amused smirk.

Mercifully, the pony using your mouth as a fart catcher raises up from your face— by a few inches only, mind you. Fart vapors visibly waft from your ruined maw as you gasp for air that is more oxygen than methane. Your eyes are bloodshot, rolled back into your head and full of tears. You sniffle and snort in a vain attempt to clear her sulpherous emissions from your sinuses. “N-no... no more...” you mumble hoarsely, weakly shaking your head.

“Oh my god, that stinks!” She exclaims with a giggle and quickly fans the steam rising from your mouth. “You could use a breath mint... thanks for the help though. I got some pretty sweet samples.” In an act of further indignity, she presses her hoof to a button, and a replay of all the farts injected into your muzzle play back-to-back. In a few of them, the sound of your pitiful whimpers can be heard in the background. Vinyl notices them as well, but acknowledges them by remarking that she thinks they really “add to the composition”, whatever that means. You can’t truly imagine it adds to anything other than your furthered humiliation.
1232121221.title: “Let's move onto something else.”

1232122.content:
Somehow keeping your balance, you successfully retrieve the microphone and get back onto stable footing.

You take a look at it. It might not be worth much, but just knowing you've stolen something from Vinyl is satisfaction enough.

Just as quietly as you sneaked in, you sneak back out and towards the front door, but a voice freezes you in your tracks.

"I should've known."

You look round to see Octavia at the top of the stairs, expression stern.

"I spoke to some of my friends who live in Canterlot. They've never heard of a Peppermint Swirl cleaning anything. I didn't want to believe it, but I suppose now it's impossible to deny."

You realize you're still holding the microphone. Shit. There really is no way to explain this away.

"I'd prefer if you didn't make a scene. I doubt Vinyl would be any happier with what you've done than I am. You can try to run, if you want, but I've already told the guards around Ponyville to be on the lookout for you. I knew it was a matter of time before you tried something like this. I thought you'd be a little more intelligent than to do it on the first night."

You're speechless. She really has left you cornered. You can forget your position working with Twilight. You're effectively a fugitive now, though she could of course just be bluffing. How would she know you were going to do this when you yourself only though it up moments ago?

Still, if she isn't, you won't get far, and being thrown into jail doesn't seem like a much more preferable option.

"If you'd come up to my room, we can discuss what's going to happen next. I wouldn't want to wake Vinyl."

Taking one last second to see if you can spot one last escape plan, you give in and head up the stairs shamefully.

She follows you into her room and closes the door behind you both.

This is the polar opposite of Vinyl's bedoom; clean, spacious, well-aired. It almost looks like an entirely different house.

"I think we can work something out. I don't think I should have to turn you in to the authorities, but in return, of course, you're going to have to do something for me."

You gulp. "What?"

"From now on, you'll be working up here as my personal servant. No pay. As far as Vinyl will be aware, you will have left early. You stay up here, serve me whenever and however I want, and if you make any attempt to escape or tell Vinyl; If you try to form some little scheme, then I will have you thrown in jail. Do you understand?"

You're not sure what you even have left to say. She really has covered everything. You're helpless.

If you’re going to be staying somewhere for the night, tracking down an inn would not be a bad idea. You can already tell the flashy, hundred-storey high hotels in Fillydelphia wont be found here, but the idea of a quaint little hostelry is very appealing anyway.

As you wade through the densest part of the crowd, you try and search for either a pony to ask or some kind of sign.

There is, in fact, a sign off towards a fountain. The two pointed planks of wood on it, facing in opposing directions, read ‘The Noble Pony Inn and Pub’ and ‘Public library.’

Knowing you, there’s still a chance you’ll get lost somehow, so asking a pony may be a good idea.

You decide on asking...
125.title: ‘Inn’ a hurry to find an inn

1252.content:
"We're not lost!"

"Yes, we are! Oh, we'll never learn to be cartographers if we can't even read a silly old map!"

"That's not what cartography is, Scootaloo, and besides, we said we were gonna be adventure ponies!"

"No we didn't!"

"Uh, yes we did!"

"Why do we need to be anything? We already have our cutie marks!"

"That's not the point!"

As you approach the fillies' argument only seems to grow more heated. You notice they're not even holding the map the right side up.

"Uhh..."

They all fix their gaze on you.

"Can we help you?" The one with the clean white coat asks you.

"Actually... I was just looking for directions to somewhere I could stay for the night."

The one with the little red bow in her hair perks up, seemingly caught by some great revelation.

"Hey! This is perfect! We can show you around! Set you up someplace fer the night - make your visit real accomodatin'!"

"Oh, no, that's alright! I just wanted to-"

"No, I insist! What do you girls say?"

The orange filly - you seem to remember her being referred to as Scootaloo - is filled with a burst of excitement.
"Hey! He can stay in our clubhouse! It's not like we use it at night!"

"That's a great idea, Scootaloo! Oh, we could have a slumber party! This is so exciting!"

You remain still as the fillies prance around you excitedly.

You're not sure you signed up for a slumber party but you're not going to turn down small town hospitality.

The fillies introduce themselves - Apple Bloom, Scootaloo, and Sweetie Belle, and you introduce yourself.

After an exhaustive tour of Ponyville proper and a quick pit stop to try some "famous" Ponyville carrots and sweet treats, the evening is drawing closer and the three fillies show you the way through the orchard and to their little treehouse.

It is little, but admittedly quite comfy once you're inside and four sets of blankets and pillows are laid out in preparation.

They tell you everything - from what they've been doing at school, to their favorite places to frequent in town, to their favorite foods. It's like they're taking advantage of having somepony who'll listen to what they have to say.

You notice Scootaloo is a little... off, though. She increasingly involves herself less in the conversations, rubbing her stomach and wincing to herself.

"Girls?"

"Yeah, Scootaloo?"

"I'm not feeling so good. I think it was... ugh... something I ate!"

"Now you mention it." Sweetie Belle chimes in, "My tummy's a little grumbly, too."

"How about yours, Peppermint?"

"It's fine."

"Hm. I'll bet it was those school lunches again!"

"Right! Half the stuff they give us barely resembles food! It's probably made of cardboard or somethin'!"

Eventually, it seems that nondescript pain becomes a very clearly sourced one; all at once the three fillies come to the same conclusion:

12522.content:
"I feel like I've got a ton of led in there and I need to drop it now!" Scootaloo squirms in place, eyes widening with desperation.

This same affliction seems to soon spread to her two friends, who seem equally uncomfortable.

pfffrt

Before explaining herself Scootaloo hurries down the ladder, letting out a little string of accidental toots as she does so.

The two other girls follow behind her, and you hurry along to make sure they're not going to do anything dangerous.

They're looking around for a place to deposit, each sequentially letting out hot, sultry farts that sound riskier and riskier.

"Th-That bush over there! It's perfect!"

"What if somepony sees us?"

Scootaloo realizes you're standing right behind them.

"Peppermint will keep watch, right?"

You're not entirely sure what you can say other than yes. You wouldn't want some pervert stumbling across them shitting in the middle of the woods. Who knows the kind of shit ponies get off to? (Literally)

They all make a dash for the shrubbery, you follow behind them as they stand in a circle, butts facing inwards.

"Okay. Let's just make sure there's nopony around before we start." Apple Bloom suggests.

Once she starts, her friends are encouraged to join her; first Apple Bloom's shrivelled little pucker spreads as wide as it can and passes a surprisingly thick log of feces.

Sweetie joins in soon after, though her waste releases in little watery spurts. She curls over as the spurts become a longer stream.

The fillies gasp and sigh exasperatedly, the air high with both the sound of fresh scat sliding along the surface of their sphincters and the smell of their combined dung.

Good Celestia, it is not a pleasant smell.

As ripe as manure comes; a smell so sour and disagreeing you have to cover your muzzle with your hoof.

You give a glance over your shoulder to check there's nopony around, though really you don't expect there ever would be this far out into the orchard.

"It just... ugh.... keeps .... mmmhff... coming!"

"Ah think I g-got the last of it!" Apple Bloom announces, finishing off her bundle with a big thick coil.

You notice that Scootaloo's onslaught of mud seems to stop coming too, though Sweetie Belle is seemingly not running out any time soon.

Her friends seem to notice this, too; turning to admire the still-constant stream of splattering peanut-brown excrement piling on to the growing mound behind her that spreads out across the ground.

"Hey! Look at Sweetie Belle go!"

"How can one filly be full of that much poop!?"

They're... cheering her on? This feels a little inappropriate to say the least.

As if that's not questionable enough, Scootaloo and Apple Bloom sidle up behind her, one on each side, and each spread one of her small filly cheeks out away from her asshole.

This seems to increase the pressure of the shit jet pouring out of her. She trembles.

"It... won't stop!"

"C'mon! Keep up like this and your poop pile will reach the clubhouse!"

They don't seem phased one bit by the little speckles of brown that splatter onto their faces this close to the splash zone.
The smell so close must be absolutely abhorrent, but neither filly seems to mind.

Is this just how ponies are in small towns? Is this what rural life does to them?

The stream dies down to a trickle, but surprisingly starts right back up again, fuelled by a wet slobbering fart that blasts Apple Bloom and Scootaloo with a mist of shit.

"Eww! Hey, Sweetie Belle! You blew poop all over us!"

"This'll take forever to get outta my coat!"

"S-Sorry, girls!"

This is what it takes to make them disgusted? These fillies are insane.

Finally, at great length, Sweetie Belle seems to have spent her supply of runny half-solid matter.

She collapses forwards.

"Holy moly, Sweetie Belle! That's gotta be at least five pounds of the stuff!"

"I feel so much better!" The unicorn filly sighs into the grass around her mouth.

"Hm. What do we do with this stuff now?" Scootaloo inspects the pile of three-filly shit that's so big it could be seen from the sky.

1253.content:
Nothing wrong with trying to follow your own intuition.

You head down the street the sign directs you to, feeling the crowd lessen around you as you pass through a more residential part of Ponyville.

After making one wrong turn, then the right one, then proceeding down a slightly creepy-looking alleyway, you find yourself outside the Noble Pony. Looks like your directional skills aren’t too shabby after all.

You enter, the warm and rich atmosphere of the inn readily apparent. There’s the sound of clinking glasses, laughter, even somepony playing an old piano somewhere in the boisterous crowd.

If you’re going to book a room for the night, the bar seems like the best place to ask, though before you reach the bar itself, your attention is drawn to a circle of stallions off into the left wing of the building around a table.

“Okay, So which ‘a you scaredy ponies wants to try me on next? I already told y’all I can drink cider ‘till the cows come home!”

The circle breaks slightly, and you see that this southern-tinged voice is coming from a mare! An orange mare with a plaited mane and a large brown cowboy hat, wiping the residue of a glass of cider from her lips, looking around eagerly for a stallion to step up to the challenge.

You’re quite surprised to see a mare out-drink such burly, largely-built colts and Stallions, but she seems to be pretty unmatched so far. You did always have a knack at drink-offs yourself.

Now wasn’t the time to be distracted by hoydenish cowgirls, though, or was it?
1253.title: Nopony, and follow the sign by yourself

12531.content:
Your curiosity gets the better of you, and you find yourself wandering over to the circling stallions.

"C'mon! Y'all can't seriously be too scared to drink a mare under the table!" She laughs loudly, another two rounds of cider being placed down onto the table.

She searches around the crowd for an appropriate opponent, before, of course, she settles on you.

"You! Ya look like you can hold down a few pints!"

You pause, while every other stallion's eyes attach onto you.

"C'mooon, I'm payin' fer it today, but you'll be payin' fer it tomorrow." She chuckles.

The pressure's already too much to turn down her challenge, and she seems like she's already been drinking for a while, so surely it can't be too hard to out-drink her.

You take a seat opposite her, the stallions surrounding you whispering and gasping amongst themselves.

"Okay, so here's how it's gonna work - Down the glass, in one gulp, and whoever falls down first loses. Right?"

You eye up the two foaming pint glasses in front of you. This is such a stupid idea...

"Three! Two! One!" The orange mare counts you in, and then she's off, her head tilted back and her throat surging as she gulps down the cider. You quickly join her in downing a glass of it yourself, if you weren't having to swallow it down at such a pace you'd remark it was pretty good cider.

She finishes her glass a few seconds before you, wiping her lip with a satisfied grin. You pull your empty glass away breathlessly.

"Pretty good cider, huh? Made it maself, y'know?"

You nod, but before you have even a chance to catch your breath, she's moved onto the second glass, and you join her.

It's surprisingly quite exhausting, and though you do have a high alcohol tolerance, you're starting to feel a little lightheaded from the lack of oxygen alone. All you can see is the golden-orange beverage drain away from your glass, your vision blurring for a second as you focus entirely on finishing the whole glass.

You slam your glass down onto the table, taking in desperate breaths, all the while the mare opposite you simply sits and smiles, unphased.

"Not bad at all! Yer doin' better than half these so-called stallions, but it's time for the big guns."

She leans over and says something to a pony, who head over to the bar.

"Now, a few months back, we had these real special dark apples growin' in the orchard, and I took that opportunity to make some special dark cider. Now, this stuff's pretty strong. Had Big Mac sleepin' like a baby after jus' one glass. Let's see how ya do." She winked, and the two large tankards were placed down in front of you, once more there were two glasses each.

If you weren't tipsy already, after this you sure would be. The ponies around the table gasped, but Applejack's smug countenance was unchanged.

"Three... Two..... One!!"

You both swung the tankards up to your lips, gulping the cider down. It was immediately obvious that this was much stronger. It was far more bitter than sweet, and with nearly the potency of whiskey, but now you'd gotten this far your pride was setting in. You're not giving in that easily.

The cider was heavy as you swallowed it down your gullet, sitting in your stomach like a rock and making your head lighter.

You both completed your cups, and she seemed impressed.

"Wow! Yer doin' better than I expected! Nopony's gotten further than this last pint, though. Good luck." She grinned as she held the glass in front of her; she looked as if she could quite easily down another five of these if she wanted, but this was it.

You took a deep breath, and both began to drink. You were starting to feel the effects of the alcohol take hold of you, but not in a pleasant way. A headache was starting to form, but you power on, every mouthful of dense, dark cider becoming more and more difficult to swallow.

After about ten seconds. You both slam your tankards onto the table, and...

Though a little dizzy, you remain seated, Looking straight at the mare, who seems genuinely surprised.

“Okay, Okay... guess you got a little more in ya than I expected. I ain’t giving up that easy, though. Just gotta find something else to beat you at!”

She pauses, and you hear a quiet bubbling traveling up her throat, exploding into a loud, uncouth belch.

She giggles. “Well, Excuse me!” And then pauses. “Hold on.. I got it. A burp off.”

The crowd of ponies circling the table all murmur. This mare certainly brings to question the idea of being ‘ladylike’.

“Sure.” You reply, not exactly sure you have a chance but also feeling bubbles brew up in your stomach - if you were going to be trumped by a mare, at least you would be trying your best.

“Well, it’s your turn!” She flashes a sly grin towards you, arm rested idly on the table as if this is merely second nature to her - and based on her rowdy, uncouth personality, you were starting to think it is.

It wasn’t hard to let out the first burp, freeing some of the bubbles trapped down inside you, resulting in a decent belch that seems to match the mare’s.

HUUUUUUUUURRRRP

“Well?” She pulls you out of your train of thought.
“Gonna follow up or just take the easy way out and let me win?”

1253121.title: You succeed!

12531211.content:
Still not quite sure why, you’re compelled to follow the mare... even just to get her name.

It feels like it goes even deeper than that, though. She must have really left an impression on you. Either that, or you’re more susceptible to alcohol than you thought.

With a steady canter you’re back out in the street, and spot the orange pony heading across towards the center of town. You pull up just behind her and she looks round, seemingly puzzled.

“What do you want? Don’t tell me you want a rematch. Some folks don’t know when to quit.”

What do you want? You’re not even sure how to answer now you’re here and have her staring you down, awaiting an explanation.

“I couldn’t just walk away like that. You’re... not like most other mares.”

She doesn’t respond, her eyes looking you up and down, and finally she smirks, as if she’s caught on to a secret you didn’t even know you were keeping.

“Oh, I get it.” She chuckled. “You liked what I did back there, didn’t you?”

What? What was she talking about?

“Don’t worry. Ain’t no shame in it. If you’re gonna get your corn hard form farts, good thing you came across the best farter in Ponyville.”

You really were lost. She couldn’t be suggesting that you were... attracted to her farts, could she? You felt as if you could be attracted to her, but the raucous wind she seemed to pump out like air, the smell of which you could still feel in the back of your throat, was the least attractive thing about her.

“That is the reason you followed me, right?”

You couldn’t just let her slip away now, though, and for some reason came out with...

“Yes. Y-Yes. Your flatulence was so... alluring.”

It felt awkward to even say, but you couldn’t imagine a situation where it wouldn’t.

She laughed again. “And Granny Smith always said letting fly the way I do would keep admirers away. I’m Applejack, by the way.”

She offered you her hoof, and worried for a second she might let something go if you tugged it, reached across and shook it.

“You’re in luck, too. I don’t know what I ate but my belly’s brewin’ up somethin’ fierce.”

You realize the situation you now have yourself in, but you want to see where it’ll go.

“In fact, I was going to stop by my friend Rainbow Dash and see if she wanted a contest. If not her, then Pinkie Pie. Those two usually seem to be up for it. We could certainly use an impartial - or partial - judge.”

“Contest?”

She stares at you for a second. “Uh... fart contest. I assumed that was obvious given you just lost one.” She added teasingly.

“However, if you’re more inclined, we could just head back to the farm and I could give you a little one on one session. I’m sure that’s one of your wildest fantasies, right?”

Did either of these options even sound preferable? It seemed to come down to being farted on by either one pony or two. Either way, the end result was not too different.

“How about we walk and I’ll have a think about it?”

“If you want. We gotta head in the same direction either way.”

And so you headed off in whatever direction that was - you and Applejack.

You thought for a moment about how different your day could be going if you hadn’t decided to follow her outside. You’d probably be resting on a comfortable bed in a room upstairs, but you would also be wondering what might have happened had you not followed her.

How were you going to play along, too? Feign an attraction to farts? If the one she let out earlier was any indication, they wouldn’t be pleasant to inhale willingly, but then perhaps she’d find some triumph in making even someone aroused by farts disgusted by hers.

“What brings you to Ponyville, anyways?” She struck up a conversation.

“I’m here to work with Twilight Sparkle as an assistant.”

“You don’t say. We’re good friends, although - I think you made the right choice. I can’t imagine her gas smellin’ any worse than a bouquet of flowers, or something. Come to think of it, I’m not sure I’ve ever even heard her cut the cheese.”

Again, you’re not sure how to answer, but the walk across town seems to have passed much more quickly than you expected.

“Well. Here we are. The fork in the road, so to speak. Do you want to judge a contest or have me all to yourself?”

You felt as if you’d made up your mind, and go with...
12531211.title: Chase her down

choices: The door opens and you’re caught red-handed
You spot an empty barrel and hide just in time
125312112.content:
“Can’t say I blame you. This is just what you were after, huh?”

Maybe you could get a bit closer to the mare by spending time with just her. Well, you know you’ll be getting much closer, but in more ways than one.

You’re surprised she’s so open to all this, especially seeing as you don’t even know her. You get an impression she might be slightly into farts herself, even if she doesn’t let on that she is.

You continue up a hill until you reach a quaint little orchard and an old, red farmhouse in the middle of it. You’re really out in the heart of the country here. It makes sense that a mare like Applejack would live somewhere like this.

“The others are out deliverin’ supplies today, so I can really make the rafters rattle.” She chuckles and leads you into the old barn.

Almost the instant you’re inside, an unrestrained burp escapes her.

“Ugh. All that walkin’s really made my lunch back up on me. I ain’t feelin’ too great.”

You can audibly hear her stomach let out a pained sound, and she grits her teeth, rubbing her bloated belly.

“I don’t care what position you wanna get in but get in it now ‘cos I can’t hold it in much longer.”

You panic for a second, not exactly sure what someone who wanted this would do, and quickly head round back of her, just leaning forward, one arm rested on Applejack’s lower back and your face about level with her rump.

About a split second after you assume this position, she lets go of the hold she had on her sphincter and a muddy, sputtering fart blasts out in a hot wind like a rip cord being tugged.

Her tail lifts and tickles your forehead, dusty and dry, while her orifice beneath spews the warm stream of air forward, and it really can be described as a stream; it sustains for probably a few seconds before stopping.

The smell is the same as earlier, only much more potent. It’s like hot rubber and fresh manure all with a sickly eggy undertone, and it takes all your strength to not gag immediately.

“Whew! Boy, I needed that!”

And again, another fart rips and roars around your face; you can tell by the sound and the airstream that there was very little effort expended to discharge this.

The smell stings your nose again, making your stomach lurch and your head light and dizzy.

She lets out a hearty grunt.

“Don’t be shy! Get in there!”

Without a word of warning, the pony backs up until you feel yourself against a wall, forced into a sitting position with your face pressed firmly against her yielding posterior.

You notice her cheeks, which seem to be spread either side of your face; when you open your eyes you realise that you really are wedged in tightly.

“That’s better, now rate this one!”

She effortlessly eases more foul-smelling wind out, only this time your face muffles the sound, but sadly not the smell.

It sounds bassy and strained as the gas now has far less area to be released into, instead you feel it squeeze across your cheeks, slightly ticklish, and of course occupying the only available space besides that - your nostrils.

Applejack doesn’t seem to be so pleased with the vastly reduced tone of her odious emission and pushes harder, causing the smelly jet of wind to push out more viciously so much so that there’s a louder sound coming from the air pushing between your face cheeks and her ass cheeks than there is from her actual anus.

It stops suddenly and she lets out a gasp.

“It’s kinda hard to push these out with your face in the way.” She breathlessly says.

You recall times in the past where you’ve rode past a field full of manure; that sour, sharp, ripe smell that made you cover your nose. Applejack’s farts smell like you’ve had your head dunked in a large trough filled with that exact manure.

“Lemme do it into your mouth.” She demands, and for some reason you accept, opening wide and sitting up slightly so your mouth covers her anus, sealing it on all sides.

“Impressive stamina you got there!”
She calls back, before demonstrating her own stamina and straining out even more gas; this pony is like a machine!

You feel the fart reverberate around your mouth, rumbling your cheeks as it trails down along your tongue.

The sound this time is not so much muffled as hollow. Your instinct with a huge stream of gas flooding into your mouth is to tighten up your throat, which seems to only make it sound even more hollow.

You feel the gas escape out past your lips, overflowing from the confines of your mouth.

You’re not exactly sure how someone could enjoy an experience like this, which makes it even harder to act like you do.

Out of nowhere, there are what sounds like hoofsteps just outside the barn door.

The shock causes Applejack to pump a short staccato fart into your mouth before quickly moving away.

“Applejack? You in there?” A deep southern drawl comes through from the other side of the door.

“I thought he was out!” She whispers to you, clearly alarmed to find you’re not alone.

You hear whoever is outside trying the door and she looks round at you as if to tell you to hide.

You panic, searching around the barn until...
125312112.title: Just Applejack

1253121122.content:
Just as you duck inside, your visibility is reduced by something blocking the top of the barrel: Applejack’s ass. She was sitting atop the barrel, plugging it up with her perky and extremely smelly rear. In the low light, you can still make out her shapely ass, bisected by her tail and swollen anus. The reeking muscle hangs less than a foot from your face, striking fear deep within you. You gulp thickly, and before you can do anything, you hear the sound of the barn door creaking open.

Applejack laughs, strained and suspicious. “Big Mac! Fancy seein’ you here.” She says, immediately wanting to face-hoof at her poor attempt at seeming inconspicuous.

The stallion quirks a brow, and Applejack is speaking again before he can reply. “I thought you were taking Granny into town.”

“Her hip started actin’ up,” Big Mac replies, walking further into the barn. “So it’s back to work fer me”. Applejack shifts atop the barrel nervously, “I-I see...” A low grumble sounds from her gut, causing your own to drop. It’s the only warning you receive before her tight plothole parts and blows a bassy growler of a fart into your confined space.

“Shoot!” You hear the stallion exclaim, “You alright, sis? That sounded nasty.”

It was nasty. The earlier stench of her farts quickly fills the barrel completely, blocked from airing out by the cowpony’s plump posterior. It takes every ounce of self control to not gag as your olfactory system is ravaged.

“Yeah, I think my lunch didn’t agree with me is all,” Applejack replies with a strained tone. Her pucker twitches before ejecting another blast, quieter than the first but no less potent.

“Well, keep sittin’ on that barrel. Yer gas makes the barn smell like a field of roses.” Big Mac was, well, BIG— but even his farts couldn’t hold a candle to his sister’s. On more than one occasion, the mare had been forced to sleep on the porch to keep from fumigating the entire Apple Family home. Her gas could work as an effective pesticide— that was, if it didn’t also kill the plant life.

Below, you felt like you had entered the world’s stinkiest sauna. The heat of her intestines was oppressive, cooking you beneath her ass. “Will do,” Applejack replies with a light chuckle. In her mind, she was giving you what you wanted while also sparing her family the reek of her gas. A win-win scenario. The oblivious mare grunts lightly before ripping another nostril-burner into the barrel, ending with a relieved sigh.

The air in the barrel had taken on a yellowish-brown hue, her rancid gas hanging visibly in the air. Your eyes watered, gazing through squinted lids up at Applejack’s anus as it pulses and erupts again, the hot and eggy wind burning your eyes. Your mane was going flat, cooked by the humidity of her guts and no doubt now carrying the sickening stink.

Big Mac eyed the scene with a vaguely repulsed look before returning to retrieving some equipment he needed. You could hear movement outside the barrel during the moments in which Applejack’s flatulence wasn’t deafening you with its orchestra of rude noises. Mercifully, you hear the barn door creak open once more, and then shut close.
1253121122.title: You spot an empty barrel and hide just in time

choices: Give up and tell her the truth
Stick to your lie and seal your smelly fate
12531211222.content:
You hear Big Mac’s hoofsteps die away into the distance and it’s your cue to sigh a breath of relief.
Even if you’ve had to endure a lung-cramping gassing he didn’t seem to notice you.

“Is he gone?”

“Yup.”

Applejack shifts atop her gas chamber and eeks out a long, gusty eye-wateringly potent torrent of gas.

It swirls and dances in greenish hues around your suffering nostrils and reinstates your disgust.

“Uh... you can get off now.”

“Hm. Nah.”

“Nah!?”

She brings up a drawling chuckle, and with it a drawling belch.

“...and just why would you want me to get off? This is your fetish, remember? Shoot, this must be heaven for you, sugarcube! All my farts nice and condensed like that.”

Her tailhole quivers and vomits out another foul burst of noisy gas, ringing around the inside of the barrel for a moment.

“Phew. ‘Sides — my belly’s so bloated I ain’t even sure I could shift from this...”

She leans aside, providing you with a glimpse of daylight but also a wet fart, and then settles back down with a hefty grunt.

“...spot. Granny’s Girdles, that one reeks!”

It’s no longer a case of marginal disgust; if she doesn’t let you grab a lungful of fresh air soon you’re going to either pass our or vomit or both.

“Y’know, if I dropped one as smelly as that in the house, I’d have the room cleared in seconds, and here you are takin’ it all nice and raw and undiluted.”

Your desperation burgeons into heaving panic; you push your hooves up into the ass-meat flowing tightly over the rim of the barrel, but as you try to lift Applejack you only bring another fart shooting out of her stinkhole and steaming your face.

Every breath only draws in more and more of that smell of trash-heap egg and pungent, rancid grass.

The air is so thick with fumes you can almost chew on them. Your face is glazed in sweat and so hot and flushed you could have sworn you had a sunburn.

Applejack rudely brings up another raucous belch and lets it hang in the air.

“Tastes like granny’s apple n’ bean surprise! Stuff always gets me gassed up somethin’ fierce. Has me blowin’ off the bedsheets everytime she whips it up.”

If this smell once belonged to apples and beans, it certainly doesn’t resemble them now.

“I... can’t breathe down here!”

“Oh, hush. Don’t you fret. Just lay back an’ enjoy the storm.”

She looses a throaty grunt and feels a long, wet fart empty into the vessel below her, sounding not unlike the revving of a chainsaw.

“Whew. Good gravy, that one sounded raunchy. Burned my butthole some.”

The appalling stench redoubles and so does the humidity.
It’s so superheated that you’re sweating like a pig, feeling your world spin and wheel around your head.
Every breath carries the repugnance of stale, stagnant apple farts. To think that right now you could be comfortable and warm in a hotel room.

Well... you’re certainly warm, but it’s a sickly warmth. Like the overbearing sultry air deep in the foliage of a jungle.

Only now do you notice that you’re not completely alone inside the barrel.
A few flies spin around in the stink, three settle on Applejack’s cheeks, pausing for a moment to polish their little legs together and indulge in what, to them, likely smells like a fresh pile of scat.
Another perches on your brow for a few seconds before taking off and whizzing around with a little buzz.

Just as you feel as if you might drift off, a tight trombone note sounds off from above you and pulls you to attention; it’s as if she won’t even allow you a moment’s respite from her gastrointestinal maelstrom.

This one hits you directly. A little sickeningly warm puff of rancid eggy gas. You notice two of the three flies are caught in the stream and fall with gentle thuds to the bottom of the barrel, stone dead.
You dry heave. Another quacking fart stirs the air, depletes your oxygen, and it’s all you can take.

"Applejack!"

There is a pause, and a quick scoff.

"You ain't into farts, are ya?"

"Wh-What!? Of course I am!"

"Come now, Peppermint. I'm the element of honesty, and that means it ain't hard for me to winnow out the truth from the.."

fraaaaap

"...exactly." She chuckles.
"Don't get me wrong. If'n you're willin' to keep it up even after all this, you must really like me. I'm plum grateful, but one thing you're gonna wanna know is we apples do not tolerate lies. Truth only. Do you like farts?"

"Yes!"

Her ass acts as a buzzer and blows a hot honk against your face.

"Let's try again. Do you like farts?"

In the darkness you can just about make out the sight of her distended plothole struggling to contain the sheer pressure of her next fart.

"Yes..."

On cue another gush of air boils your senses. This one is uncharacteristically silent - a searing hiss.
The smell bowls you over with a thousand tonnes of pure stink. It smells less like gassy eggs and more like pure, stomach-turning manure.
Her stomach rolls with a noisy growl.

"Ooh. My belly don't feel too good up here, Peppermint. You wouldn't want me to turn this barrel into an outhouse."

Your blood runs cold.
You don't doubt for a second that she's being completely serious.

"This next one's gonna be risky! Let's give it one last try. Do you like farts?"
12531211222.title: She decides she likes this new position

12532.content:
You're far too tired to investigate the commotion, as intriguing as it may be.

Paying at the bar and taking your key, you head up the stairway to the upper floor where the rooms are located.

It's simple; just a bed, a small bathroom, and a table, but it'll do for the night. It's certainly more cozy than any inner-city hotel room could hope to be.

You relax back on the bed and rest your eyes for what quickly becomes a few hours.

The night begins to fall outside. The noise of busy ponies reduces to near-silence.

...and you're bored as fuck.

Staring at the ceiling is only entertaining for so long.

You figure there's still a whole town to explore. If you're going to be staying here, it's worth acquainting yourself with the place.
Perhaps Ponyville has some kind of nightlife?

Regardless, you grab your key and head out, passing down through the now slightly less rowdy pub and forwards to the entrance.

The night outside is surprisingly a little chilly for the middle of summer, but pleasantly still.

It's so quiet - a kind of quietude you could never hope to experience in the city.
In fact, there really aren't a lot of ponies around. A few here and there heading back from work to their homes, but the streets are largely unoccupied.

There's still a lot this town has to offer you, and it may even be more interesting to see what's what at night.

Taking a look around, you settle on...

You took a look around you, trying to get a sense of your bearings and also see if there was anything interesting to go take a look at to kill some time.
